sqlMap.select: SELECT T1.APNO ,T1.ISSUYM ,T1.APLPAYDATE ,T1.BEFISSUEAMT ,T1.APLPAYAMT ,T1.PAYBEGYM ,T1.PAYENDYM ,T2.APPDATE ,T2.EVTNAME ,T2.EVTBRDATE ,T2.EVTIDNNO ,T2.PROCSTAT ,T2.CASETYP ,T2.PROMOTEUSER ,T2.PAYTYP ,T2.EVTJOBDATE ,T3.STEXPNDDATE ,T3.STEXPNDREASON ,T3.STEXPNDMK FROM (SELECT TT1.APNO ,TT1.ISSUYM ,TT1.APLPAYDATE ,SUM(TT1.BEFISSUEAMT) AS BEFISSUEAMT ,SUM(TT1.APLPAYAMT) AS APLPAYAMT ,MAX(TT1.PAYYM) AS PAYENDYM ,MIN(TT1.PAYYM) AS PAYBEGYM FROM BADAPR TT1 WHERE TT1.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND TT1.MTESTMK = 'F' AND TT1.APLPAYMK = '3' AND TT1.CHKDATE IS NOT NULL AND NVL(TRIM(TT1.CHKDATE),' ')<>' ' AND TT1.APLPAYDATE IS NOT NULL AND NVL(TRIM(TT1.APLPAYDATE),' ')<>' ' AND TT1.ISSUYM = (SELECT MAX(TT3.ISSUYM) FROM BADAPR TT3 WHERE TT3.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#) GROUP BY TT1.APNO,TT1.ISSUYM,TT1.APLPAYDATE ) T1, (SELECT TT2.APNO ,TT2.ISSUYM ,TT2.APPDATE ,TT2.EVTNAME ,TT2.EVTBRDATE ,TT2.EVTIDNNO ,TT2.PROCSTAT ,TT2.CASETYP ,TT2.PROMOTEUSER ,TT2.PAYTYP ,TT2.EVTJOBDATE FROM BAAPPBASE TT2 WHERE TT2.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND TT2.SEQNO = '0000' ) T2, (SELECT TT3.STEXPNDDATE ,TT3.STEXPNDREASON ,TT3.STEXPNDMK ,TT3.APNO ,TT3.ISSUYM FROM BADAPR TT3 WHERE TT3.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND TT3.MTESTMK = 'F' AND TT3.STEXPNDMK IS NOT NULL AND NVL(TRIM(TT3.STEXPNDMK),' ')<>' ' AND TT3.CHKDATE IS NOT NULL AND NVL(TRIM(TT3.CHKDATE),' ')<>' ' AND TT3.APLPAYDATE IS NOT NULL AND NVL(TRIM(TT3.APLPAYDATE),' ')<>' ' ) T3 WHERE T1.APNO = T2.APNO AND T1.APNO = T3.APNO(+) AND T1.ISSUYM = T2.ISSUYM AND T1.ISSUYM = T3.ISSUYM(+) AND T2.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND T1.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#

SELECT * FROM BADAPR
1 = 0
APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
ORDER BY BADAPRID

SELECT b.BADAPRID, b.BAAPPBASEID, b.APNO, b.SEQNO, b.ISSUYM, b.PAYYM, b.NITRMY, b.NITRMM, b.APLPAYSENIY, b.APLPAYSENIM, b.INSAVGAMT, b.ANNUAMT, b.OCACCADDAMT, b.BEFISSUEAMT, b.ISSUEAMT FROM BAAPPBASE a, BADAPR b WHERE a.BAAPPBASEID = b.BAAPPBASEID AND a.APNO = b.APNO AND a.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND a.ISSUYM = b.ISSUYM AND a.PAYYM = b.PAYYM AND a.SEQNO = '0000'

SELECT a.benname, a.benevtrel, a.benidnno, a.apno, a.seqno, a.mitrate, b.issuym, b.payym, b.ISSUEAMT FROM BAAPPBASE a, BADAPR b WHERE a.apno = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND a.issuym = (SELECT MAX(ISSUYM) FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#) AND a.baappbaseid = b.baappbaseid AND a.apno = b.apno ORDER BY b.seqno, b.payym DESC

Select T1.APNO ,T1.SEQNO ,T1.ISSUYM ,T1.PAYYM ,T1.APLPAYDATE ,T1.REMITDATE ,T2.APPDATE ,T2.BENNAME ,T2.BENIDNNO ,T2.BENEVTREL ,T2.PAYTYP ,T2.ACCREL ,T2.MUSTISSUEAMT ,T2.EVTJOBDATE ,(CASE WHEN (T2.PAYTYP='1' OR T2.PAYTYP='2') THEN CASE WHEN (T1.APLPAYAMT>0 AND T1.APLPAYDATE IS NOT NULL AND T1.APLPAYDATE<>' ' AND REMITDATE=' ') THEN ' ' ELSE '1' END WHEN (T2.PAYTYP='3') THEN CASE WHEN (T1.APLPAYDATE IS NOT NULL AND T1.APLPAYDATE<>' ' AND REMITDATE=' ') THEN ' ' ELSE '2' END ELSE CASE WHEN (T1.APLPAYDATE IS NOT NULL AND T1.APLPAYDATE<>' ') THEN CASE WHEN (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')<=(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T1.APLPAYDATE,'YYYYMMDD')+3,'YYYYMMDD'))) THEN ' ' ELSE '3' END ELSE '3' END END ) AS STEXPND from (Select TT1.APNO ,TT1.SEQNO ,TT1.ISSUYM ,TT1.PAYYM ,TT1.APLPAYDATE ,deCode(TT1.REMITMK,'1',TT1.REMITDATE,' ') REMITDATE, TT1.APLPAYAMT from BADAPR TT1 where TT1.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# and TT1.MTESTMK = 'F' and TT1.APLPAYMK = '3' and (trim(TT1.CHKDATE) is not null) and TT1.ISSUYM = (Select MAX(TT3.ISSUYM) from BADAPR TT3 where TT3.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#) ) T1, (Select TT2.APNO ,TT2.SEQNO ,TT2.ISSUYM ,TT2.APPDATE ,TT2.BENNAME ,TT2.BENIDNNO ,TT2.BENEVTREL ,TT2.PAYTYP ,TT2.ACCREL ,TT2.MUSTISSUEAMT ,TT2.EVTJOBDATE from BAAPPBASE TT2 where TT2.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# and TT2.BENPAYMK = '1' ) T2 where T1.APNO = T2.APNO and T1.SEQNO = T2.SEQNO and T1.ISSUYM = T2.ISSUYM and T2.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# and T1.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# order by T1.PAYYM,T1.SEQNO
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BADAPR Set STEXPNDMK = 'Y', STEXPNDREASON = #stexpndReason:VARCHAR#, STEXPNDDATE = #stexpndDate:VARCHAR#, PROCTIME = #procTime:VARCHAR# WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: Select T1.BADAPRID, T1.BAAPPBASEID, T1.APNO, T1.SEQNO, T1.ISSUYM, T1.PAYYM, T1.MTESTMK, T1.VERISEQ, T1.MCHKTYP, T1.MAPNO, T1.MAPROOTMK, T1.BENIDS, T1.BENIDN, T1.OLDAB, T1.OLDAAMT, T1.OLDBAMT, T1.SUPRECMK, T1.BEFISSUEAMT, T1.ADJUSTAMT, T1.RECAMT, T1.SUPAMT, T1.APLPAYAMT, T1.PAYRATE, T1.ANNUAMT, T1.UNITPAYAMT, T1.RETURNAMT, T1.REMAINAMT, T1.COMPENAMT, T1.LECOMAMT, T1.RECOMAMT, T1.LOANAMT, T1.RECAPAMT, T1.LOANITRT, T1.DLINEDATE, T1.OFFSETEXP, T1.OFFSETAMT, T1.OTHERAMT, T1.REMITAMT, T1.OVRCUTAMT, T1.PAYBANANCE, T1.APLPAYMK, T1.APLPAYDATE, T1.GENMEDDATE, T1.REMITMK, T1.REMITDATE, T1.TRANSACTIOND, T1.STEXPNDMK, T1.STEXPNDREASON, T1.STEXPNDDATE, T1.ACCEPTMK, T1.MANCHKMK, T1.CPRNDATE, T1.CPRNPAGE, T1.CHKDATE, T1.PROCTIME, T1.BUREAUACC, T1.PAYEEACC, T1.NITRMY, T1.NITRMM, T1.APLPAYSENIY, T1.APLPAYSENIM, T1.NOLDTY, T1.NOLDTM, T1.VALSENIY, T1.VALSENIM, T1.INSAVGAMT, T1.BADDEBTAMT, T1.OLDRATE, T1.OLDRATESDATE, T1.OLDRATEEDATE, T2.ISSUEAMT, T2.APITEM from (Select BADAPRID, BAAPPBASEID, APNO, SEQNO, ISSUYM, PAYYM, MTESTMK, VERISEQ, MCHKTYP, MAPNO, MAPROOTMK, BENIDS, BENIDN, OLDAB, OLDAAMT, OLDBAMT, SUPRECMK, ISSUEAMT, ADJUSTAMT, RECAMT, SUPAMT, APLPAYAMT, PAYRATE, ANNUAMT, UNITPAYAMT, RETURNAMT, REMAINAMT, COMPENAMT, LECOMAMT, RECOMAMT, LOANAMT, RECAPAMT, LOANITRT, DLINEDATE, OFFSETEXP, OFFSETAMT, OTHERAMT, REMITAMT, OVRCUTAMT, PAYBANANCE, APLPAYMK, APLPAYDATE, GENMEDDATE, REMITMK, REMITDATE, TRANSACTIOND, STEXPNDMK, STEXPNDREASON, STEXPNDDATE, ACCEPTMK, MANCHKMK, CPRNDATE, CPRNPAGE, CHKDATE, PROCTIME, BUREAUACC, PAYEEACC, NITRMY, NITRMM, APLPAYSENIY, APLPAYSENIM, NOLDTY, NOLDTM, VALSENIY, VALSENIM, INSAVGAMT, BADDEBTAMT, OLDRATE, OLDRATESDATE, OLDRATEEDATE, BEFISSUEAMT from BADAPR where APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# and SEQNO = '0000' and MTESTMK = 'D') T1 ,(Select BAAPPBASEID, APNO, ISSUYM, PAYYM, APITEM, APPDATE, BENNAME, BENBRDATE, BENIDNNO, ISSUEAMT from BAAPPBASE where APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# and SEQNO = '0000') T2 WHERE T1.BAAPPBASEID = T2.BAAPPBASEID AND T1.APNO = T2.APNO AND T1.APNO= #apNo:VARCHAR# AND T1.ISSUYM = T2.ISSUYM AND T1.PAYYM = T2.PAYYM

Select T1.BADAPRID, T1.BAAPPBASEID, T1.APNO, T1.SEQNO, T1.ISSUYM, T1.PAYYM, T1.MTESTMK, T1.VERISEQ, T1.MCHKTYP, T1.MAPNO, T1.MAPROOTMK, T1.BENIDS, T1.BENIDN, T1.OLDAB, T1.OLDAAMT, T1.OLDBAMT, T1.SUPRECMK, T1.BEFISSUEAMT, T1.ADJUSTAMT, T1.RECAMT, T1.SUPAMT, T1.APLPAYAMT, T1.PAYRATE, T1.ANNUAMT, T1.UNITPAYAMT, T1.RETURNAMT, T1.REMAINAMT, T1.COMPENAMT, T1.LECOMAMT, T1.RECOMAMT, T1.LOANAMT, T1.RECAPAMT, T1.LOANITRT, T1.DLINEDATE, T1.OFFSETEXP, T1.OFFSETAMT, T1.OTHERAMT, T1.REMITAMT, T1.OVRCUTAMT, T1.PAYBANANCE, T1.APLPAYMK, T1.APLPAYDATE, T1.GENMEDDATE, T1.REMITMK, T1.REMITDATE, T1.TRANSACTIOND, T1.STEXPNDMK, T1.STEXPNDREASON, T1.STEXPNDDATE, T1.ACCEPTMK, T1.MANCHKMK, T1.CPRNDATE, T1.CPRNPAGE, T1.CHKDATE, T1.PROCTIME, T1.BUREAUACC, T1.PAYEEACC, T1.NITRMY, T1.NITRMM, T1.APLPAYSENIY, T1.APLPAYSENIM, T1.NOLDTY, T1.NOLDTM, T1.VALSENIY, T1.VALSENIM, T1.INSAVGAMT, T1.BADDEBTAMT, T1.OLDRATE, T1.OLDRATESDATE, T1.OLDRATEEDATE, T2.ISSUEAMT, T2.APITEM from (Select BADAPRID, BAAPPBASEID, APNO, SEQNO, ISSUYM, PAYYM, MTESTMK, VERISEQ, MCHKTYP, MAPNO, MAPROOTMK, BENIDS, BENIDN, OLDAB, OLDAAMT, OLDBAMT, SUPRECMK, ISSUEAMT, ADJUSTAMT, RECAMT, SUPAMT, APLPAYAMT, PAYRATE, ANNUAMT, UNITPAYAMT, RETURNAMT, REMAINAMT, COMPENAMT, LECOMAMT, RECOMAMT, LOANAMT, RECAPAMT, LOANITRT, DLINEDATE, OFFSETEXP, OFFSETAMT, OTHERAMT, REMITAMT, OVRCUTAMT, PAYBANANCE, APLPAYMK, APLPAYDATE, GENMEDDATE, REMITMK, REMITDATE, TRANSACTIOND, STEXPNDMK, STEXPNDREASON, STEXPNDDATE, ACCEPTMK, MANCHKMK, CPRNDATE, CPRNPAGE, CHKDATE, PROCTIME, BUREAUACC, PAYEEACC, NITRMY, NITRMM, APLPAYSENIY, APLPAYSENIM, NOLDTY, NOLDTM, VALSENIY, VALSENIM, INSAVGAMT, BADDEBTAMT, OLDRATE, OLDRATESDATE, OLDRATEEDATE, BEFISSUEAMT, PAYKIND from BADAPR where APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# and SEQNO = '0000' and MTESTMK = 'D') T1 ,(Select BAAPPBASEID, APNO, ISSUYM, PAYYM, APITEM, APPDATE, BENNAME, BENBRDATE, BENIDNNO, ISSUEAMT from BAAPPBASE where APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# and SEQNO = '0000') T2 WHERE T1.BAAPPBASEID = T2.BAAPPBASEID AND T1.APNO = T2.APNO AND T1.APNO= #apNo:VARCHAR# AND T1.ISSUYM = T2.ISSUYM AND T1.PAYYM = T2.PAYYM AND T1.PAYKIND = '35'

SELECT A.PAYYM, SUM(DECODE(A.MCHKTYP,'2',DECODE(A.SUPRECMK,'C',nvl(A.SUPAMT,0),'D',0,nvl(A.ISSUEAMT,0)) ,'5',DECODE(A.SUPRECMK,'C',nvl(A.SUPAMT,0),'D',0,nvl(A.ISSUEAMT,0)),nvl(A.ISSUEAMT,0))) AS ISSUEAMT, SUM(nvl(A.RECAMT,0)) AS RECAMT, SUM(NVL(A.PAYBANANCE,0)+NVL(A.REMITAMT,0)+NVL(A.OVRCUTAMT,0)) AS PAYBANANCE, SUM(nvl(A.SUPAMT,0)) AS SUPAMT, SUM(DECODE(A.BENEVTREL,'F',0,nvl(A.OFFSETAMT,0))) AS OFFSETAMT, SUM(nvl(A.OTHERAMT,0)) AS OTHERAMT, SUM(nvl(A.APLPAYAMT,0)) AS APLPAYAMT FROM BADAPR A WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#
AND A.VERISEQ = (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#) GROUP BY APNO,ISSUYM,PAYYM ORDER BY PAYYM

SELECT COUNT(*) DATACOUNT FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND BENEVTREL IN ('1','2','3','4','5','6','7') AND MTESTMK = 'D'
AND 1 = 0
(MANCHKMK IS NULL OR MANCHKMK=' ')
MANCHKMK = 'N'

SELECT E.VERISEQ AS VERISEQ, SUM(E.ISSUEAMT) AS ISSUEAMT, SUM(E.ADJUSTAMT) AS ADJUSTAMT, SUM(E.SUPAMT) AS SUPAMT, SUM(E.OFFSETAMT) AS OFFSETAMT, SUM(E.OTHERAMT) AS OTHERAMT, SUM(E.APLPAYAMT) AS APLPAYAMT From ( Select A.VERISEQ AS "VERISEQ", SUM(A.ISSUEAMT) AS "ISSUEAMT", SUM(A.ADJUSTAMT) AS "ADJUSTAMT", 0 AS "SUPAMT", SUM(CASE A.BENEVTREL WHEN 'F' THEN 0 ELSE A.OFFSETAMT END) AS "OFFSETAMT", SUM(A.OTHERAMT) AS "OTHERAMT", SUM(A.APLPAYAMT) AS "APLPAYAMT" From BADAPR A Where A.APNO= #apNo:VARCHAR# And A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# And (A.SUPRECMK = '' Or A.SUPRECMK Is Null) And A.VERISEQ = ( SELECT MAX(to_Number(B.VERISEQ)) From BADAPR B Where B.APNO= #apNo:VARCHAR# And B.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# ) Group By A.VERISEQ union Select C.VERISEQ AS "VERISEQ", 0 AS "ISSUEAMT", 0 AS "ADJUSTAMT", SUM(C.SUPAMT) AS "SUPAMT", 0 AS "OFFSETAMT", SUM(C.OTHERAMT) AS "OTHERAMT", SUM(C.APLPAYAMT) AS "APLPAYAMT" From BADAPR C Where C.APNO= #apNo:VARCHAR# And C.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# And C.SUPRECMK = 'C' And C.VERISEQ = ( SELECT MAX(to_Number(D.VERISEQ)) From BADAPR D Where D.APNO= #apNo:VARCHAR# And D.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# ) Group By C.VERISEQ ) E Group By E.VERISEQ

SELECT A.PAYYM AS PAYYM, SUM(A.ISSUEAMT) AS ISSUEAMT, SUM(A.ISSUCALCAMT) AS ISSUCALCAMT, SUM(A.RECAMT) AS RECAMT, SUM(A.SUPAMT) AS SUPAMT, SUM(CASE A.BENEVTREL WHEN 'F' THEN 0 ELSE A.OFFSETAMT END) AS "OFFSETAMT", SUM(A.OTHERAMT) AS OTHERAMT, SUM(A.APLPAYAMT) AS APLPAYAMT, SUM(A.PAYRATE) AS PAYRATE FROM BADAPR A
1 = 0
A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#
A.VERISEQ = ( SELECT MAX(to_Number(VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# )
GROUP BY A.PAYYM ORDER BY A.PAYYM

SELECT A.LOANAMT, A.RECAPAMT, A.LOANITRT, A.DLINEDATE, A.BADDEBTAMT, A.OFFSETEXP, Sum(A.OFFSETAMT) AS OFFSETAMT FROM BADAPR A
1 = 0
A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.SEQNO = '0000'
A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND SUPRECMK IS NULL
A.VERISEQ = ( SELECT MAX(to_Number(VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# )
and A.OFFSETAMT > 0
GROUP BY A.LOANAMT, A.RECAPAMT, A.LOANITRT, A.DLINEDATE, A.BADDEBTAMT, A.OFFSETEXP

SELECT A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.ISSUYM, A.PAYYM, A.VERISEQ, A.INSAVGAMT, A.ITRMY, A.ITRMD, A.NITRMY, A.NITRMM, A.NOLDTY, A.NOLDTM, A.VALSENIY, A.VALSENIM, A.APLPAYSENIY, A.APLPAYSENIM, A.OLDAB, A.OLDAAMT, A.OLDBAMT, A.OLDRATE, A.OLDRATESDATE, A.OLDRATEEDATE, A.ISSUEAMT, A.ADJUSTAMT, A.RECAMT, A.SUPAMT, A.APLPAYAMT, A.ANNUAMT FROM BADAPR A
1 = 0
A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.SEQNO = '0000'
A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#
A.VERISEQ = ( SELECT MAX(to_Number(VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# )
AND ROWNUM <= 1

SELECT A.CHKDATE, DECODE(A.APLPAYMK, '3', A.APLPAYDATE) AS APLPAYDATE, A.RECAMT, A.SUPAMT FROM BADAPR A
1 = 0
A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.SEQNO = '0000'
A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#
A.PAYYM = #payYm:VARCHAR#
AND A.MTESTMK = 'F' AND A.APLPAYMK = '3' AND A.MANCHKMK = 'Y'
AND (A.APLPAYDATE IS NOT NULL OR A.APLPAYDATE <> '') AND ROWNUM <= 1

SELECT A.PAYYM, (CASE A.SUPRECMK WHEN 'C' THEN A.SUPAMT WHEN 'D' THEN NULL ELSE A.ISSUEAMT END) AS ISSUEAMT, A.OTHERAMT, A.PAYRATE, A.APLPAYAMT, A.BADDEBTAMT, A.OFFSETAMT, A.UNITPAYAMT, A.RETURNAMT, A.REMAINAMT, A.LOANAMT, A.COMPENAMT, A.LECOMAMT, A.RECOMAMT FROM BADAPR A
1 = 0
A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
A.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#
A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#
A.VERISEQ = ( SELECT MAX(to_Number(VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# )
ORDER BY A.PAYYM
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BADAPR SET MANCHKMK = #manchkMk:VARCHAR# WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND MTESTMK = #mtestMk:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT DECODE(T1.BENEVTREL,'Z',T2.BENNAME,T1.BENNAME) AS BENNAME, T1.BENEVTREL, T2.SEQNO, T2.ISSUYM, T2.PAYYM, T2.ISSUEAMT, T2.OFFSETAMT, T2.OTHERAMT, T2.RECAMT, T2.APLPAYAMT, T2.MANCHKMK, T2.REMITDATE, T2.APLPAYDATE, T2.STEXPNDDATE, T2.INHERITORAMT FROM (SELECT X.BAAPPBASEID, X.APNO, X.SEQNO, X.BENNAME, X.BENEVTREL FROM BAAPPBASE X WHERE X.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
AND X.BENEVTREL <> 'F'
) T1, (SELECT Y.BAAPPBASEID, Z.GVNAME BENNAME, Y.APNO, Y.SEQNO, Y.ISSUYM, Y.PAYYM, Y.ISSUEAMT, Y.OTHERAMT, Y.OFFSETAMT, Y.APLPAYAMT, DECODE(Y.SUPRECMK,'C',Y.SUPAMT,'D','-'||Y.RECAMT,'0') AS RECAMT, Y.MANCHKMK, deCode(Y.REMITMK,'1',#varIn:VARCHAR#||Y.REMITDATE,'2',#varOut:VARCHAR#||Y.REMITDATE,'3',#varMod:VARCHAR#||Y.REMITDATE,' ') AS REMITDATE, deCode(Y.APLPAYMK,'3',Y.APLPAYDATE,' ') AS APLPAYDATE, Y.STEXPNDDATE, Y.INHERITORAMT FROM BADAPR Y, BCCMF08 Z WHERE Y.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND Y.MTESTMK = 'F'
AND Y.BENEVTREL <> 'F'
AND Y.BENIDN = Z.GVCD1(+)
AND 1 = 0
Y.ISSUYM >= #startYm:VARCHAR# AND Y.ISSUYM <= #endYm:VARCHAR#
Y.PAYYM >= #startYm:VARCHAR# AND Y.PAYYM <= #endYm:VARCHAR#
) T2 WHERE T1.BAAPPBASEID = T2.BAAPPBASEID AND T1.APNO = T2.APNO AND T1.SEQNO = T2.SEQNO
ORDER BY SEQNO,ISSUYM DESC,PAYYM DESC
ORDER BY SEQNO,PAYYM DESC,ISSUYM DESC

SELECT T.APNO, T.ISSUYM, T.PAYYM, SUM(T.ISSUEAMT) AS ISSUEAMT, SUM(T.ADJUSTAMT) AS ADJUSTAMT, SUM(T.APLPAYAMT) AS APLPAYAMT, T.CHKDATE FROM BADAPR T WHERE T.APNO=#apNo:VARCHAR# AND T.ISSUYM=#issuYm:VARCHAR# AND T.PAYYM=#payYm:VARCHAR# GROUP BY APNO,ISSUYM,PAYYM,CHKDATE

SELECT T.APNO, T.NITRMY, T.NITRMM, T.ITRMY, T.ITRMD, T.APLPAYSENIY, T.APLPAYSENIM, T.NOLDTY, T.NOLDTM, T.VALSENIY, T.VALSENIM, T.INSAVGAMT FROM BADAPR T WHERE T.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND T.SEQNO = '0000' AND ROWNUM = 1 ORDER BY ISSUYM DESC

Select BADAPRID, BAAPPBASEID, APNO, SEQNO, ISSUYM, PAYYM, MTESTMK, VERISEQ, MCHKTYP, MAPNO, MAPROOTMK, BENIDS, BENIDN, OLDAB, OLDAAMT, OLDBAMT, SUPRECMK, ISSUEAMT, ADJUSTAMT, RECAMT, SUPAMT, APLPAYAMT, PAYRATE, ANNUAMT, UNITPAYAMT, RETURNAMT, REMAINAMT, COMPENAMT, LECOMAMT, RECOMAMT, LOANAMT, RECAPAMT, LOANITRT, DLINEDATE, OFFSETEXP, OFFSETAMT, OTHERAMT, REMITAMT, OVRCUTAMT, PAYBANANCE, APLPAYMK, deCode(APLPAYMK,'3',APLPAYDATE,' ') as APLPAYDATE, GENMEDDATE, REMITMK, REMITDATE, TRANSACTIOND, STEXPNDMK, STEXPNDREASON, STEXPNDDATE, ACCEPTMK, MANCHKMK, CPRNDATE, CPRNPAGE, CHKDATE, PROCTIME, BUREAUACC, PAYEEACC, NITRMY, NITRMM, APLPAYSENIY, APLPAYSENIM, NOLDTY, NOLDTM, VALSENIY, VALSENIM, INSAVGAMT, BADDEBTAMT, OLDRATE, OLDRATESDATE, OLDRATEEDATE FROM BADAPR
WHERE MTESTMK = 'F' AND MANCHKMK = 'Y' AND STEXPNDMK = 'Y' AND NVL(TRIM(CHKDATE),' ') <> ' ' AND APLPAYDATE IS NOT NULL AND NVL(TRIM(APLPAYDATE),' ') <> ' ' AND (NVL(TRIM(REMITMK),' ') <> '1')
1 = 0
APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#
ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#
Order By PAYYM

Select Count(Distinct SEQNO) FROM BADAPR WHERE MTESTMK = 'F' AND MANCHKMK = 'Y' AND STEXPNDMK = 'Y' AND NVL(TRIM(CHKDATE), ' ') <> ' ' AND APLPAYDATE IS NOT NULL AND NVL(TRIM(APLPAYDATE), ' ') <> ' ' AND (NVL(TRIM(REMITMK), ' ') <> '1') AND APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND Aplpayamt > 0

Select Count(Distinct A.SEQNO) FROM BADAPR A, BAAPPBASE B WHERE A.MTESTMK = 'F' AND A.MANCHKMK = 'Y' AND A.STEXPNDMK = 'Y' AND NVL(TRIM(A.CHKDATE), ' ') <> ' ' AND A.APLPAYDATE IS NOT NULL AND NVL(TRIM(A.APLPAYDATE), ' ') <> ' ' AND (NVL(TRIM(A.REMITMK), ' ') <> '1') AND A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND A.Aplpayamt > 0 AND A.APNO = B.APNO AND A.SEQNO = B.SEQNO AND B.ACCREL = '1'

Select A.APNO, A.ISSUYM, MIN(A.PAYYM) PAYYMBEG, MAX(A.PAYYM) PAYYMEND, Max(TO_NUMBER(A.VERISEQ)) VERISEQ, B.EVTNAME, SUM(A.APLPAYAMT) APLPAYAMT, SUM(A.ISSUEAMT) ISSUEAMT FROM BADAPR A,BAAPPBASE B
WHERE A.BAAPPBASEID = B.BAAPPBASEID AND A.MTESTMK = 'F' AND A.MANCHKMK = 'Y' AND (A.CHKDATE <> '' Or A.CHKDATE Is Not Null)
1 = 0
A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#
Group by A.APNO,A.ISSUYM,B.EVTNAME
SELECT T.ANNUAMT FROM BADAPR T WHERE T.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND T.SEQNO = '0000' AND T.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND T.MTESTMK = 'D'

SELECT SUM(ISSUCALCAMT) ISSUCALCAMT FROM BADAPR A WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.SEQNO = '0000' AND A.MTESTMK = 'F' AND A.APLPAYMK = '3' AND A.APLPAYDATE IS NOT NULL
AND A.PAYKIND <> '37'
AND A.ISSUYM = (SELECT MAX(B.ISSUYM) FROM BADAPR B WHERE B.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND B.SEQNO = '0000' AND B.MTESTMK = 'F' AND B.APLPAYMK = '3' AND B.APLPAYDATE IS NOT NULL ) AND A.PAYYM = (SELECT MAX(C.PAYYM) FROM BADAPR C WHERE C.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND C.SEQNO = '0000' AND C.MTESTMK = 'F' AND C.APLPAYMK = '3' AND C.APLPAYDATE IS NOT NULL AND C.ISSUYM = (SELECT MAX(D.ISSUYM) FROM BADAPR D WHERE D.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND D.SEQNO = '0000' AND D.MTESTMK = 'F' AND D.APLPAYMK = '3' AND D.APLPAYDATE IS NOT NULL ))

SELECT APNO, SEQNO, ISSUYM, PAYYM, VERISEQ, INSAVGAMT, NITRMY, NITRMM, NOLDTY, NOLDTM, APLPAYSENIY, APLPAYSENIM, VALSENIY, VALSENIM, OLDAB, OLDAAMT, OLDBAMT, OLDRATE, OLDRATESDATE, OLDRATEEDATE, ISSUEAMT, APLPAYAMT, APLPAYMK, APLPAYDATE, PAYRATE, LOANAMT, RECAPAMT, LOANITRT, OFFSETEXP, QUALCOUNT, OFFSETAMT, COMPENAMT, DLINEDATE, BEFISSUEAMT From BADAPR A where A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And A.SEQNO = '0000' And A.MANCHKMK = 'Y'
A.ISSUYM= (Select MAX(B.ISSUYM) From BADAPR B Where B.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And B.MANCHKMK = 'Y' And B.MTESTMK='F' And B.APLPAYMK = '3' And TRIM(B.APLPAYDATE) Is Not Null )
A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#
And A.MTESTMK='F' And Trim(A.SUPRECMK) Is Null And A.APLPAYMK = '3' And TRIM(A.APLPAYDATE) Is Not Null And A.PAYYM = ( Select Min(B.PAYYM) From BADAPR B Where B.APNO= #apNo:VARCHAR# And B.ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM And B.MANCHKMK = 'Y' And B.MTESTMK='F' And B.APLPAYMK = '3' And TRIM(B.APLPAYDATE) Is Not Null And Trim(B.SUPRECMK) Is Null ) And RowNum = 1

SELECT APNO, SEQNO, ISSUYM, PAYYM, VERISEQ, INSAVGAMT, NITRMY, NITRMM, NOLDTY, NOLDTM, APLPAYSENIY, APLPAYSENIM, VALSENIY, VALSENIM, OLDAB, OLDAAMT, OLDBAMT, OLDRATE, OLDRATESDATE, OLDRATEEDATE, ISSUEAMT, APLPAYAMT, APLPAYMK, APLPAYDATE, PAYRATE, LOANAMT, RECAPAMT, LOANITRT, OFFSETEXP, QUALCOUNT, OFFSETAMT, COMPENAMT, DLINEDATE, BEFISSUEAMT From BADAPR A Where A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And A.SEQNO = '0000' And A.ISSUYM= #issuYm:VARCHAR# And A.PAYYM = ( Select Max(B.PAYYM) From BADAPR B Where B.APNO= #apNo:VARCHAR# And B.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# And B.VERISEQ = ( Select Max(TO_NUMBER(C.VERISEQ)) From BADAPR C Where C.APNO= #apNo:VARCHAR# And C.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# ) ) And A.VERISEQ = ( Select Max(TO_NUMBER(D.VERISEQ)) From BADAPR D Where D.APNO= #apNo:VARCHAR# And D.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# ) And Trim(A.SUPRECMK) Is Null And RowNum = 1

SELECT APNO, SEQNO, ISSUYM, PAYYM, VERISEQ, INSAVGAMT, NITRMY, NITRMM, NOLDTY, NOLDTM, APLPAYSENIY, APLPAYSENIM, VALSENIY, VALSENIM, OLDAB, OLDAAMT, OLDBAMT, OLDRATE, OLDRATESDATE, OLDRATEEDATE, ISSUEAMT, APLPAYAMT, APLPAYMK, APLPAYDATE, PAYRATE, LOANAMT, RECAPAMT, LOANITRT, OFFSETEXP, QUALCOUNT, OFFSETAMT, COMPENAMT, DLINEDATE, BEFISSUEAMT From BADAPR A Where A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And A.SEQNO = '0000' And A.ISSUYM= #issuYm:VARCHAR# And A.PAYYM = ( Select Min(B.PAYYM) From BADAPR B Where B.APNO= #apNo:VARCHAR# And B.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# And B.VERISEQ = ( Select Max(TO_NUMBER(C.VERISEQ)) From BADAPR C Where C.APNO= #apNo:VARCHAR# And C.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# And Trim(C.SUPRECMK) Is Null ) And Trim(B.SUPRECMK) Is Null ) And A.VERISEQ = ( Select Max(TO_NUMBER(D.VERISEQ)) From BADAPR D Where D.APNO= #apNo:VARCHAR# And D.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# And Trim(D.SUPRECMK) Is Null ) And Trim(A.SUPRECMK) Is Null And RowNum = 1

SELECT APNO, SEQNO, ISSUYM, PAYYM, VERISEQ, INSAVGAMT, NITRMY, NITRMM, NOLDTY, NOLDTM, APLPAYSENIY, APLPAYSENIM, VALSENIY, VALSENIM, OLDAB, OLDAAMT, OLDBAMT, OLDRATE, OLDRATESDATE, OLDRATEEDATE, SUM(ISSUEAMT) OVER (PARTITION BY APNO) ISSUEAMT, APLPAYAMT, APLPAYMK, APLPAYDATE, PAYRATE, LOANAMT, RECAPAMT, LOANITRT, OFFSETEXP, QUALCOUNT, OFFSETAMT, COMPENAMT, DLINEDATE, SUM(BEFISSUEAMT) OVER (PARTITION BY APNO) BEFISSUEAMT From BADAPR A Where A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And A.SEQNO = '0000' And A.ISSUYM= #issuYm:VARCHAR# And A.PAYYM = ( Select Max(B.PAYYM) From BADAPR B Where B.APNO= #apNo:VARCHAR# And B.SEQNO = '0000' And B.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# And B.VERISEQ = ( Select Max(TO_NUMBER(C.VERISEQ)) From BADAPR C Where C.APNO= #apNo:VARCHAR# And C.SEQNO = '0000' And C.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# ) ) And A.VERISEQ = ( Select Max(TO_NUMBER(D.VERISEQ)) From BADAPR D Where D.APNO= #apNo:VARCHAR# And D.SEQNO = '0000' And D.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# ) And Trim(A.SUPRECMK) Is Null

Select APNO, ISSUYM, MIN(PAYYM) as MINPAYYM, (SELECT MAX(PAYYM) From BADAPR A Where A.APNO= #apNo:VARCHAR# And A.MANCHKMK = 'Y'
A.ISSUYM = (Select MAX(B.ISSUYM) From BADAPR B Where B.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And B.MANCHKMK = 'Y' And B.MTESTMK='F' And B.APLPAYMK = '3' And TRIM(B.APLPAYDATE) Is Not Null )
A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#
And A.MTESTMK='F' And Trim(A.SUPRECMK) Is Null And A.APLPAYMK = '3' And TRIM(A.APLPAYDATE) Is Not Null
And (SUPAMT <> 0 OR ISSUEAMT <> 0) ) as MANPAYYM,
NVL(SUM(APLPAYAMT), '0') as SUMAPLPAYAMT, NVL(SUM(ISSUEAMT), '0') as SUMISSUEAMT, NVL(SUM(ADJUSTAMT), '0') as SUMADJUSTAMT, NVL(SUM(OTHERAMT), '0') as SUMOTHERAMT, NVL(SUM(SUPAMT), '0') as SUMSUPAMT, NVL(SUM(OFFSETAMT), '0') as SUMOFFSETAMT, NVL(SUM(BEFISSUEAMT), '0') as SUMBEFISSUEAMT, MAX(PAYYM) as MAXPAYYM, SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(MAX(PAYYM),'YYYYMM') , -1), 'YYYYMMDD'),1,6) as PREYM From BADAPR A Where A.APNO= #apNo:VARCHAR# And A.SEQNO = '0000' And A.MANCHKMK = 'Y'
A.ISSUYM = (Select MAX(B.ISSUYM) From BADAPR B Where B.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And B.MANCHKMK = 'Y' And B.MTESTMK='F' And B.APLPAYMK = '3' And TRIM(B.APLPAYDATE) Is Not Null )
A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#
And A.MTESTMK='F' And Trim(A.SUPRECMK) Is Null And A.APLPAYMK = '3' And TRIM(A.APLPAYDATE) Is Not Null Group By A.APNO, A.ISSUYM

Select APNO, ISSUYM, MIN(PAYYM) as MINPAYYM, (select MAX(PAYYM) From BADAPR A Where APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# And VERISEQ = (Select Max(TO_NUMBER(VERISEQ)) From BADAPR Where APNO= #apNo:VARCHAR# And ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# ) And TRIM(SUPRECMK) IS NULL
And (SUPAMT <> 0 OR ISSUEAMT <> 0)) as MANPAYYM,
NVL(SUM(APLPAYAMT), '0') as SUMAPLPAYAMT, NVL(SUM(ISSUEAMT), '0') as SUMISSUEAMT, NVL(SUM(ADJUSTAMT), '0') as SUMADJUSTAMT, NVL(SUM(OTHERAMT), '0') as SUMOTHERAMT, NVL(SUM(SUPAMT), '0') as SUMSUPAMT, NVL(SUM(OFFSETAMT), '0') as SUMOFFSETAMT, NVL(SUM(BEFISSUEAMT), '0') as SUMBEFISSUEAMT, MAX(PAYYM) as MAXPAYYM, SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(MAX(PAYYM),'YYYYMM') , -1), 'YYYYMMDD'),1,6) as PREYM From BADAPR A Where APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And SEQNO = '0000' And ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# And VERISEQ = ( Select Max(TO_NUMBER(VERISEQ)) From BADAPR Where APNO= #apNo:VARCHAR# And ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# ) And TRIM(SUPRECMK) IS NULL Group By APNO,ISSUYM

SELECT (MONTHS_BETWEEN(TO_DATE((NVL(MAX(t.PAYYM),'999901') || '01'), 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_DATE((NVL(MIN(t.PAYYM),'999901') || '01'), 'YYYYMMDD')) + 1) As "PAYYMCOUNT", Min(t.PAYYM) As "MINPAYYM", Max(t.PAYYM) As "MAXPAYYM", SUM(t.BEFISSUEAMT) As "SUMBEFISSUEAMT", NVL(SUM(t.APLPAYAMT), '0') as "SUMAPLPAYAMT" From BADAPR t Where t.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
t.SEQNO < '0000'
t.SEQNO <= '0000'
t.SEQNO = '0000'
t.SEQNO >= '0000'
t.SEQNO > '0000'
t.SEQNO != '0000'
And t.ISSUYM= #issuYm:VARCHAR# And t.VERISEQ = ( Select Max(TO_NUMBER(A.VERISEQ)) From BADAPR A Where A.APNO= #apNo:VARCHAR# And A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# )
AND t.ISSUEAMT > 0

SELECT (MONTHS_BETWEEN(TO_DATE((NVL(MAX(t.PAYYM),'999901') || '01'), 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_DATE((NVL(MIN(t.PAYYM),'999901') || '01'), 'YYYYMMDD')) + 1) As "PAYYMCOUNT", Min(t.PAYYM) As "MINPAYYM", Max(t.PAYYM) As "MAXPAYYM", SUM(t.BEFISSUEAMT) As "SUMBEFISSUEAMT", NVL(SUM(t.APLPAYAMT), '0') as "SUMAPLPAYAMT" From BADAPR t Where t.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
t.SEQNO < '0000'
t.SEQNO <= '0000'
t.SEQNO = '0000'
t.SEQNO >= '0000'
t.SEQNO > '0000'
t.SEQNO != '0000'
And t.ISSUYM= #issuYm:VARCHAR# And t.VERISEQ = ( Select Max(TO_NUMBER(A.VERISEQ)) From BADAPR A Where A.APNO= #apNo:VARCHAR# And A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# ) And Trim(t.SUPRECMK) Is Null

Select APNO, ISSUYM, MIN(PAYYM) as MINPAYYM, MAX(PAYYM) as MANPAYYM, NVL(SUM(APLPAYAMT), '0') as SUMAPLPAYAMT, NVL(SUM(ISSUEAMT), '0') as SUMISSUEAMT, NVL(SUM(ADJUSTAMT), '0') as SUMADJUSTAMT, NVL(SUM(OTHERAMT), '0') as SUMOTHERAMT, NVL(SUM(SUPAMT), '0') as SUMSUPAMT, NVL(SUM(OFFSETAMT), '0') as SUMOFFSETAMT From BADAPR A Where APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And SEQNO = '0000' And ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# And VERISEQ = ( Select Max(TO_NUMBER(VERISEQ)) From BADAPR Where APNO= #apNo:VARCHAR# And ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# ) And TRIM(SUPRECMK) IS NULL Group By APNO,ISSUYM

Select APNO, ISSUYM, MIN(PAYYM) as MINPAYYM, MAX(PAYYM) as MANPAYYM, NVL(SUM(APLPAYAMT), '0') as SUMAPLPAYAMT, NVL(SUM(ISSUEAMT), '0') as SUMISSUEAMT, NVL(SUM(ADJUSTAMT), '0') as SUMADJUSTAMT, NVL(SUM(OTHERAMT), '0') as SUMOTHERAMT, NVL(SUM(SUPAMT), '0') as SUMSUPAMT, NVL(SUM(OFFSETAMT), '0') as SUMOFFSETAMT From BADAPR A Where A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And A.SEQNO = '0000' And A.MANCHKMK = 'Y'
A.ISSUYM = (Select MIN(B.ISSUYM) From BADAPR B Where B.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And B.MANCHKMK = 'Y' And B.MTESTMK='F' And B.APLPAYMK = '3' And TRIM(B.APLPAYDATE) Is Not Null )
A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#
And A.MTESTMK='F' And Trim(A.SUPRECMK) Is Null And A.APLPAYMK = '3' And TRIM(A.APLPAYDATE) Is Not Null Group By A.APNO, A.ISSUYM

Select A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.ISSUYM, MIN(A.PAYYM) as MINPAYYM, MAX(A.PAYYM) as MAXPAYYM, NVL(SUM(A.APLPAYAMT), '0') as SUMAPLPAYAMT, NVL(SUM(A.ISSUEAMT), '0') as SUMISSUEAMT, NVL(SUM(A.ADJUSTAMT), '0') as SUMADJUSTAMT, NVL(SUM(A.OTHERAMT), '0') as SUMOTHERAMT, NVL(SUM(A.SUPAMT), '0') as SUMSUPAMT, C.BENEVTREL, C.BENNAME From BADAPR A, BAAPPBASE C Where A.APNO = C.APNO AND A.SEQNO = C.SEQNO AND A.BAAPPBASEID = C.BAAPPBASEID AND A.APNO= #apNo:VARCHAR# And A.MANCHKMK = 'Y'
A.ISSUYM = (Select MIN(B.ISSUYM) From BADAPR B Where B.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And B.MANCHKMK = 'Y' And B.MTESTMK='F' And B.APLPAYMK = '3' And TRIM(B.APLPAYDATE) Is Not Null )
A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#
And A.MTESTMK='F' And Trim(A.SUPRECMK) Is Null And A.APLPAYMK = '3' And TRIM(A.APLPAYDATE) Is Not Null
And A.SEQNO <> #seqNo:VARCHAR#
AND C.BENEVTREL IN ('2','3','4','5','6','7') Group By A.APNO, A.SEQNO, C.BENEVTREL, C.BENNAME, A.ISSUYM

Select A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.ISSUYM, MIN(A.PAYYM) as MINPAYYM, MAX(A.PAYYM) as MAXPAYYM, NVL(SUM(A.APLPAYAMT), '0') as SUMAPLPAYAMT, NVL(SUM(A.ISSUEAMT), '0') as SUMISSUEAMT, NVL(SUM(A.ADJUSTAMT), '0') as SUMADJUSTAMT, NVL(SUM(A.OTHERAMT), '0') as SUMOTHERAMT, NVL(SUM(A.SUPAMT), '0') as SUMSUPAMT, B.BENEVTREL, B.BENNAME From BADAPR A, BAAPPBASE B Where A.APNO = B.APNO AND A.SEQNO = B.SEQNO AND A.BAAPPBASEID = B.BAAPPBASEID AND A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
And A.SEQNO <> #seqNo:VARCHAR#
AND B.BENEVTREL IN ('2','3','4','5','6','7') And A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# And A.VERISEQ = (Select Max(TO_NUMBER(VERISEQ)) From BADAPR Where APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#) Group By A.APNO, A.SEQNO, B.BENEVTREL, B.BENNAME, A.ISSUYM

SELECT SUM(APLPAYAMT) + Decode(Substr(APNO,1,1),'L',0,SUM(OFFSETAMT)) AS "APLPAYAMT" FROM BADAPR WHERE MTESTMK = 'F' AND MANCHKMK = 'Y'
AND STEXPNDMK = 'Y' AND NVL(TRIM(CHKDATE),' ') <> ' ' AND APLPAYDATE IS NOT NULL AND NVL(TRIM(APLPAYDATE),' ') <> ' ' AND (NVL(TRIM(REMITMK),' ') <> '1')
1 = 0
APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#
GROUP BY APNO

Select MIN(A.PAYYM) PAYYMBEG, MAX(A.PAYYM) PAYYMEND, MAX(TO_NUMBER(A.VERISEQ)) VERISEQ, SUM(A.APLPAYAMT) APLPAYAMT, SUM(A.ISSUEAMT) ISSUEAMT FROM BADAPR A WHERE A.MTESTMK = 'F'
1 = 0
A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
A.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#
A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#
Group by A.APNO,A.SEQNO,A.ISSUYM,A.VERISEQ
SELECT MAX(APLPAYDATE) FROM BADAPR A, BAAPPBASE B WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.ISSUYM = B.ISSUYM AND A.APLPAYMK='3'
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BADAPR SET MANCHKMK = ' ', PROCTIME = #procTime:VARCHAR# WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND ISSUYM = (SELECT MAX(ISSUYM) FROM BACHKFILE WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.delete:
DELETE FROM BADAPR
1 = 0
APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
SEQNO like #seqNo:VARCHAR#||'%'
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT BADAPRID) AS BADAPRIDAMT ,COUNT(*) AS AMT ,SUM(BEFISSUEAMT) BEFISSUEAMT ,SUM(OTHERAAMT) OTHERAAMT ,SUM(OTHERBAMT) OTHERBAMT ,SUM(PAYRATE) PAYRATE ,SUM(OFFSETAMT) OFFSETAMT ,SUM(COMPENAMT) COMPENAMT ,SUM(PAY1) PAY1 ,SUM(PAY2) PAY2 ,SUM(PAY3) PAY3 ,PAYTYP ,MCHKTYP ,CHKDATE FROM (SELECT T1.BADAPRID ,T1.APNO ,T1.PAYYM ,T1.BENIDN ,deCode(T1.PAYTYP,'1','1','2','1',T1.PAYTYP) PAYTYP ,T1.CHKDATE ,NVL(T1.BEFISSUEAMT,0) BEFISSUEAMT ,NVL(T1.OTHERAAMT,0) OTHERAAMT ,NVL(T1.OTHERBAMT,0) OTHERBAMT ,NVL(T1.PAYRATE,0) PAYRATE ,NVL(T1.OFFSETAMT,0) OFFSETAMT ,NVL(T1.COMPENAMT,0) COMPENAMT ,deCode(T1.MCHKTYP,'1','1' ,'2','2' ,'5','2' ,'6','6' ,'7','6',T1.MCHKTYP) MCHKTYP ,'0' PAY1 ,'0' PAY2 ,'0' PAY3 FROM BADAPR T1,BAAPPBASE T2 WHERE T1.BAAPPBASEID = T2.BAAPPBASEID AND T1.SEQNO = T2.SEQNO AND T1.SEQNO = '0000' AND T1.ISSUYM = T2.ISSUYM AND T1.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND T1.APNO LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR#||'%' AND T1.MTESTMK = 'F' AND (T1.MCHKTYP = '1' OR T1.MCHKTYP = '2' OR T1.MCHKTYP = '5' OR T1.MCHKTYP = '6' OR T1.MCHKTYP = '7') AND T2.MANCHKMK = 'Y' AND T1.MANCHKMK = 'Y' AND T1.APLPAYMK = '3' AND (NVL(T1.REMITDATE,' ')<>' ' AND T1.REMITDATE IS NOT NULL) AND (NVL(T2.CHKDATE,' ')<>' ' AND T2.CHKDATE IS NOT NULL) AND (NVL(T2.EXEDATE,' ')<>' ' AND T2.EXEDATE IS NOT NULL) AND (NVL(T1.CHKDATE,' ')<>' ' AND T1.CHKDATE IS NOT NULL) AND T2.APPDATE>='20090201' UNION ALL SELECT T3.BADAPRID ,T3.APNO ,T3.PAYYM ,T3.BENIDN ,deCode(T3.PAYTYP,'1','1','2','1',T3.PAYTYP) PAYTYP ,T3.CHKDATE ,NVL(T3.BEFISSUEAMT,0) BEFISSUEAMT ,NVL(T3.OTHERAAMT,0) OTHERAAMT ,NVL(T3.OTHERBAMT,0) OTHERBAMT ,NVL(T3.PAYRATE,0) PAYRATE ,NVL(T3.OFFSETAMT,0) OFFSETAMT ,NVL(T3.COMPENAMT,0) COMPENAMT ,deCode(T3.MCHKTYP,'1','1' ,'2','2' ,'5','2' ,'6','6' ,'7','6',T3.MCHKTYP) MCHKTYP ,'0' PAY1 ,'0' PAY2 ,'0' PAY3 FROM BAAPPBASE T1 ,(SELECT DISTINCT APNO ,ISSUYM FROM BAPASSLIST WHERE MANCHKMK = 'Y' AND NVL(TRIM(EXEDATE),' ') <> ' ' AND EXEDATE IS NOT NULL ) T2 ,BADAPR T3 WHERE T1.BAAPPBASEID = T3.BAAPPBASEID AND T1.APNO = T2.APNO AND T1.SEQNO = T3.SEQNO AND T3.ISSUYM = T1.ISSUYM AND T1.ISSUYM = T2.ISSUYM AND T1.APPDATE < '20090201' AND T3.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND T3.APNO LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR#||'%' AND T1.SEQNO = '0000' AND T3.MTESTMK = 'F' AND (T3.MCHKTYP = '1' OR T3.MCHKTYP = '2' OR T3.MCHKTYP = '5' OR T3.MCHKTYP = '6' OR T3.MCHKTYP = '7') AND (T1.ACCEPTMK = 'Y' OR NVL(TRIM(T1.ACCEPTMK),' ') = ' ') AND (T1.CHKDATE IS NOT NULL AND NVL(T1.CHKDATE,' ')<>' ') AND T1.PROCSTAT <> '00' ) A WHERE (CHKDATE IS NOT NULL AND NVL(CHKDATE,' ')<>' ') GROUP BY PAYTYP,MCHKTYP,CHKDATE ORDER BY PAYTYP,MCHKTYP,CHKDATE

SELECT SUM(E.ISSUEAMT) AS ISSUEAMT, SUM(E.ADJUSTAMT) AS ADJUSTAMT, SUM(E.SUPAMT) AS SUPAMT, SUM(E.OFFSETAMT) AS OFFSETAMT, SUM(E.OTHERAMT) AS OTHERAMT, SUM(E.APLPAYAMT) AS APLPAYAMT From ( Select SUM(A.ISSUEAMT) AS "ISSUEAMT", SUM(A.ADJUSTAMT) AS "ADJUSTAMT", 0 AS "SUPAMT", SUM(A.OFFSETAMT) AS "OFFSETAMT", SUM(A.OTHERAMT) AS "OTHERAMT", SUM(A.APLPAYAMT) AS "APLPAYAMT" From BADAPR A Where A.APNO= #apNo:VARCHAR# And A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# And (A.SUPRECMK = '' Or A.SUPRECMK Is Null) And A.VERISEQ = ( Select Max(to_Number(B.VERISEQ)) From BADAPR B Where B.APNO= #apNo:VARCHAR# And B.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# ) union Select 0 AS "ISSUEAMT", 0 AS "ADJUSTAMT", SUM(C.SUPAMT) AS "SUPAMT", 0 AS "OFFSETAMT", SUM(C.OTHERAMT) AS "OTHERAMT", SUM(C.APLPAYAMT) AS "APLPAYAMT" From BADAPR C Where C.APNO= #apNo:VARCHAR# And C.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# And C.SUPRECMK = 'C' And C.VERISEQ = ( Select Max(to_Number(D.VERISEQ)) From BADAPR D Where D.APNO= #apNo:VARCHAR# And D.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# ) ) E

SELECT A.PAYYM, (CASE A.SUPRECMK WHEN 'C' THEN A.SUPAMT WHEN 'D' THEN NULL ELSE A.ISSUEAMT END) AS ISSUEAMT, A.OTHERAMT, A.PAYRATE, A.APLPAYAMT, A.BADDEBTAMT, A.UNITPAYAMT, A.RETURNAMT, A.REMAINAMT, A.LOANAMT, A.COMPENAMT, A.LECOMAMT, A.RECOMAMT, A.NITRMY, A.NITRMM, A.APLPAYSENIY, A.APLPAYSENIM, A.OLDAAMT, A.OLDBAMT, A.OLDRATE, (DECODE(A.OLDAB,'1',A.OLDAAMT,A.OLDBAMT)) AS OLDAMT FROM BADAPR A
1 = 0
A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
A.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#
A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#
A.VERISEQ = ( SELECT MAX(to_Number(VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# )
And TRIM(A.SUPRECMK) IS NULL And A.PAYKIND <> '37'
ORDER BY A.PAYYM

SELECT A.PAYYM, (CASE A.SUPRECMK WHEN 'C' THEN A.SUPAMT WHEN 'D' THEN NULL ELSE A.ISSUEAMT END) AS ISSUEAMT, A.OTHERAMT, A.PAYRATE, A.APLPAYAMT, A.BADDEBTAMT, A.UNITPAYAMT, A.RETURNAMT, A.REMAINAMT, A.LOANAMT, A.COMPENAMT, A.LECOMAMT, A.RECOMAMT, A.NITRMY, A.NITRMM, A.APLPAYSENIY, A.APLPAYSENIM, A.OLDAAMT, A.OLDBAMT, A.OLDRATE, (DECODE(A.OLDAB,'1',A.OLDAAMT,A.OLDBAMT)) AS OLDAMT FROM BADAPR A
1 = 0
A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
A.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#
A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#
A.VERISEQ = ( SELECT MAX(to_Number(VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# )
ORDER BY A.PAYYM,A.PAYKIND

SELECT A.PAYYM, A.ISSUEAMT, Decode(A.Paykind,'37','--37' ) PAYKIND, FLOOR(A.OLDRATE) OLDRATE, ROUND(A.OLDBAMT*A.OLDRATE*0.01) as OLDBAMT, A.COMPENAMT, A.QUALCOUNT FROM BADAPR A WHERE A.SEQNO = '0000'
A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#
A.VERISEQ = ( SELECT MAX(to_Number(VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# )
And A.PAYKIND <> '34'
ORDER BY A.PAYYM, A.PAYKIND DESC

SELECT A.PAYYM, A.ISSUEAMT, Decode(A.Paykind,'37','--37' ) PAYKIND, FLOOR(A.OLDRATE) OLDRATE, OLDBAMT, A.COMPENAMT, A.QUALCOUNT FROM BADAPR A WHERE A.SEQNO = '0000'
A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#
A.VERISEQ = ( SELECT MAX(to_Number(VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# )
ORDER BY A.PAYYM, A.PAYKIND DESC

SELECT SUM(A.COMPENAMT) as TOTAL FROM BADAPR A
WHERE A.PAYKIND <> '37'
A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
A.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#
A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#
A.VERISEQ = ( SELECT MAX(to_Number(VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# )
ORDER BY A.PAYYM

SELECT A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.ISSUYM, A.PAYYM, A.VERISEQ, A.INSAVGAMT, A.ITRMY, A.ITRMD, A.NITRMY, A.NITRMM, A.NOLDTY, A.NOLDTM, A.VALSENIY, A.VALSENIM, A.APLPAYSENIY, A.APLPAYSENIM, A.OLDAB, A.OLDAAMT, A.OLDBAMT, A.OLDRATE, A.OLDRATESDATE, A.OLDRATEEDATE, A.ISSUEAMT, A.ADJUSTAMT, A.RECAMT, A.SUPAMT, A.APLPAYAMT, A.ANNUAMT FROM BADAPR A
1 = 0
A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.SEQNO = '0000'
A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#
PAYYM = ( Select Min(PAYYM) From BADAPR Where APNO= #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND TRIM(SUPRECMK) IS NULL AND PAYKIND IN ('35','36','38') )
A.VERISEQ = ( SELECT MAX(to_Number(VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND PAYYM = A.PAYYM)
AND PAYKIND IN ('35','36','38') AND ROWNUM <= 1

SELECT A.CHKDATE, DECODE(A.APLPAYMK, '3', A.APLPAYDATE) AS APLPAYDATE, A.RECAMT, A.SUPAMT FROM BADAPR A
1 = 0
A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.SEQNO = '0000' AND A.ISSUYM = ( SELECT MAX(B.ISSUYM) FROM BADAPR B WHERE B.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND B.SEQNO = '0000' AND B.MTESTMK = 'F' AND B.APLPAYMK = '3' AND Trim(B.APLPAYDATE) Is Not NulL)
AND A.MTESTMK = 'F' AND A.APLPAYMK = '3' AND Trim(A.APLPAYDATE) Is Not Null AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT PAYYM, PAYKIND, Sum(ISSUEAMT) AS ISSUEAMT, SUM(RECAMT) AS RECAMT, SUM(PAYBANANCE) AS PAYBANANCE, SUM(SUPAMT) AS SUPAMT, SUM(OTHERAMT) AS OTHERAMT, SUM(OFFSETAMT) AS OFFSETAMT, Sum(ADJUSTAMT) AS ADJUSTAMT, SUM(APLPAYAMT) AS APLPAYAMT, SUM(ISSUCALCAMT) AS ISSUCALCAMT, SUM(PAYRATE) AS PAYRATE From (Select A.PAYYM, A.PAYKIND, (CASE A.SUPRECMK WHEN 'C' THEN NULL WHEN 'D' THEN NULL ELSE A.ISSUEAMT END) AS "ISSUEAMT", A.ISSUCALCAMT AS "ISSUCALCAMT", A.ADJUSTAMT AS "ADJUSTAMT", A.RECAMT AS "RECAMT", A.PAYBANANCE AS "PAYBANANCE", A.SUPAMT AS "SUPAMT", A.OTHERAMT AS "OTHERAMT", A.OFFSETAMT AS "OFFSETAMT", A.APLPAYAMT AS "APLPAYAMT", A.PAYRATE AS "PAYRATE" From BADAPR A
1 = 0
A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#
A.VERISEQ = ( SELECT MAX(to_Number(B.VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR B WHERE B.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND B.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# )
AND A.SEQNO = '0000'
AND A.PAYKIND <> '37'
UNION ALL Select C.PAYYM, C.PAYKIND, SUM(C.ISSUEAMT) AS "ISSUEAMT", 0 AS "ISSUCALCAMT", 0 AS "ADJUSTAMT", 0 AS "RECAMT", 0 AS "PAYBANANCE", 0 AS "SUPAMT", 0 AS "OTHERAMT", 0 AS "OTHERAMT", SUM(C.APLPAYAMT), SUM(C.PAYRATE) From BADAPR C
Where C.PAYKIND <> '37' AND C.SEQNO <> '0000'
C.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
C.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#
C.VERISEQ = ( SELECT MAX(to_Number(D.VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR D WHERE D.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND D.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# )
Group By C.PAYYM, C.PAYKIND UNION ALL Select E.PAYYM, E.PAYKIND, (CASE E.SUPRECMK WHEN 'C' THEN NULL WHEN 'D' THEN NULL ELSE E.ISSUEAMT END) AS "ISSUEAMT", E.ISSUCALCAMT AS "ISSUCALCAMT", E.ADJUSTAMT AS "ADJUSTAMT", E.RECAMT AS "RECAMT", E.PAYBANANCE AS "PAYBANANCE", E.SUPAMT AS "SUPAMT", E.OTHERAMT AS "OTHERAMT", E.OFFSETAMT AS "OFFSETAMT", E.APLPAYAMT AS "APLPAYAMT", E.PAYRATE AS "PAYRATE" From BADAPR E WHERE E.PAYKIND = '37' AND E.SEQNO = '0000'
E.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
E.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#
E.VERISEQ = ( SELECT MAX(to_Number(F.VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR F WHERE F.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND F.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# )
)Group By PAYYM, PAYKIND
ORDER BY PAYYM, PAYKIND DESC

Select A.LOANAMT, A.RECAPAMT, A.LOANITRT, A.DLINEDATE, A.BADDEBTAMT, A.OFFSETEXP, sum(A.OFFSETAMT) as OFFSETAMT From BADAPR A
1 = 0
A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#
A.VERISEQ = ( SELECT MAX(to_Number(VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000')
AND A.SEQNO = '0000' AND A.LOANAMT > 0 Group By A.LOANAMT, A.RECAPAMT, A.LOANITRT, A.DLINEDATE, A.BADDEBTAMT, A.OFFSETEXP

SELECT A.INSAVGAMT, A.BEFISSUEAMT, A.OLDBAMT, (A.OLDBAMT - A.OCACCADDAMT) AS APLPAYAMT, A.OCACCADDAMT FROM BADAPR A WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.SEQNO = '0000' AND A.PAYKIND = '37' AND A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND A.PAYYM = (SELECT MAX(C.PAYYM) FROM BADAPR C WHERE C.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND C.SEQNO = '0000' AND C.PAYKIND = '37' AND C.ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM ) AND A.VERISEQ = (SELECT MAX(to_Number(D.VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR D WHERE D.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND D.SEQNO = '0000' AND D.PAYKIND = '37' AND D.ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM)

Select SUM(E.ISSUEAMT) AS ISSUEAMT, SUM(E.ADJUSTAMT) AS ADJUSTAMT, SUM(E.SUPAMT) AS SUPAMT, SUM(E.OTHERAMT) AS OTHERAMT, SUM(E.APLPAYAMT) AS APLPAYAMT, SUM(E.OFFSETAMT) AS OFFSETAMT, SUM(E.INHERITORAMT) AS INHERITORAMT From (Select SUM(A.ISSUEAMT) AS "ISSUEAMT", SUM(A.ADJUSTAMT) AS "ADJUSTAMT", 0 AS "SUPAMT", SUM(A.OTHERAMT) AS "OTHERAMT", 0 AS "APLPAYAMT", SUM(A.OFFSETAMT) AS "OFFSETAMT", 0 AS "INHERITORAMT" From BADAPR A WHERE A.SEQNO = '0000'
A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#
A.VERISEQ = (Select Max(to_Number(B.VERISEQ)) From BADAPR B Where B.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And B.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#)
And (A.SUPRECMK = '' Or A.SUPRECMK Is Null) union all Select 0 AS "ISSUEAMT", 0 AS "ADJUSTAMT", 0 AS "SUPAMT", SUM(F.OTHERAMT) AS "OTHERAMT", SUM(F.APLPAYAMT) AS "APLPAYAMT", 0 AS "OFFSETAMT", SUM(F.INHERITORAMT) AS "INHERITORAMT" From BADAPR F
WHERE F.SEQNO <> '0000'
F.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
F.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#
F.VERISEQ = (Select Max(to_Number(G.VERISEQ)) From BADAPR G Where G.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And G.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#)
And (F.SUPRECMK = '' Or F.SUPRECMK Is Null) union all Select 0 AS "ISSUEAMT", 0 AS "ADJUSTAMT", 0 AS "SUPAMT", SUM(C.OTHERAMT) AS "OTHERAMT", SUM(C.APLPAYAMT) AS "APLPAYAMT", SUM(C.OFFSETAMT) AS "OFFSETAMT", SUM(C.INHERITORAMT) AS "INHERITORAMT" From BADAPR C WHERE C.SEQNO = '0000' AND C.SUPRECMK = 'C'
C.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
C.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#
C.VERISEQ = (Select Max(to_Number(D.VERISEQ)) From BADAPR D Where D.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And D.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#)
union all Select 0 AS "ISSUEAMT", 0 AS "ADJUSTAMT", SUM(H.SUPAMT) AS "SUPAMT", SUM(H.OTHERAMT) AS "OTHERAMT", SUM(H.APLPAYAMT) AS "APLPAYAMT", 0 AS "OFFSETAMT", SUM(H.INHERITORAMT) AS "INHERITORAMT" From BADAPR H
WHERE H.SEQNO <> '0000' AND H.SUPRECMK = 'C'
H.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
H.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#
H.VERISEQ = (Select Max(to_Number(I.VERISEQ)) From BADAPR I Where I.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And I.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#)) E

SELECT A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.ISSUYM, A.PAYYM, A.VERISEQ, A.INSAVGAMT, A.ITRMY, A.ITRMD, A.NITRMY, A.NITRMM, A.NOLDTY, A.NOLDTM, A.VALSENIY, A.VALSENIM, A.APLPAYSENIY, A.APLPAYSENIM, A.OLDAB, A.OLDAAMT, A.OLDBAMT, A.OLDRATE, A.OLDRATESDATE, A.OLDRATEEDATE, A.OLDEXTRARATE, A.ISSUEAMT, A.ADJUSTAMT, A.RECAMT, A.SUPAMT, A.APLPAYAMT, A.ANNUAMT FROM BADAPR A
1 = 0
A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.SEQNO = '0000'
A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#
A.VERISEQ = ( SELECT MAX(to_Number(VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# ) AND A.PAYYM = ( SELECT MIN(PAYYM) FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND VERISEQ = A.VERISEQ AND SUPRECMK IS NULL )
AND A.PAYKIND NOT IN ('34', '44', '54')

SELECT A.PAYYM, (CASE A.SUPRECMK WHEN 'C' THEN A.SUPAMT WHEN 'D' THEN NULL ELSE A.ISSUEAMT END) AS ISSUEAMT, A.OTHERAMT, A.PAYRATE, A.APLPAYAMT, A.BADDEBTAMT, A.UNITPAYAMT, A.RETURNAMT, A.REMAINAMT, A.LOANAMT, A.COMPENAMT, A.LECOMAMT, A.RECOMAMT, A.NITRMY, A.NITRMM, A.APLPAYSENIY, A.APLPAYSENIM, A.OLDAAMT, A.OLDBAMT, A.OLDRATE, (DECODE(A.OLDAB,'1',A.OLDAAMT,A.OLDBAMT)) AS OLDAMT FROM BADAPR A
1 = 0
A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
A.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#
A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#
A.VERISEQ = ( SELECT MAX(to_Number(VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# )
ORDER BY A.PAYYM

Select PAYYM, Sum(BEFISSUEAMT) AS ISSUEAMT, SUM(RECAMT) AS RECAMT, SUM(PAYBANANCE) AS PAYBANANCE, SUM(SUPAMT) AS SUPAMT, SUM(OTHERAMTEVT) AS OTHERAMTEVT, SUM(OTHERAMTBEN) AS OTHERAMTBEN, SUM(OFFSETAMT) AS OFFSETAMT, SUM(APLPAYAMT) AS APLPAYAMT, SUM(ISSUCALCAMT) AS ISSUCALCAMT, SUM(CPIRATE) AS CPIRATE, SUM(PAYRATE) AS PAYRATE, SUM(INHERITORAMT) AS INHERITORAMT From (Select A.PAYYM, A.BEFISSUEAMT AS BEFISSUEAMT, A.ADJUSTAMT AS "ADJUSTAMT", A.ISSUCALCAMT AS "ISSUCALCAMT", 0 AS "RECAMT", A.PAYBANANCE AS "PAYBANANCE", 0 AS "SUPAMT", A.OTHERAMT AS "OTHERAMTEVT", 0 AS "OTHERAMTBEN", A.OFFSETAMT AS "OFFSETAMT", 0 AS "APLPAYAMT", A.CPIRATE, A.PAYRATE, A.INHERITORAMT From BADAPR A WHERE A.SEQNO = '0000'
A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#
A.VERISEQ = (Select Max(to_Number(B.VERISEQ)) From BADAPR B Where B.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And B.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#)
UNION ALL Select C.PAYYM, 0 AS "BEFISSUEAMT", 0 AS "ADJUSTAMT", 0 AS "ISSUCALCAMT", SUM(C.RECAMT) AS "RECAMT", SUM(C.PAYBANANCE) AS "PAYBANANCE", SUM(C.SUPAMT) AS "SUPAMT", 0 AS "OTHERAMTEVT", SUM(C.OTHERAMT) AS "OTHERAMTBEN", SUM(C.OFFSETAMT), SUM(C.APLPAYAMT), SUM(C.CPIRATE), SUM(C.PAYRATE), SUM(C.INHERITORAMT) AS "INHERITORAMT" From BADAPR C WHERE
C.SEQNO <> '0000'
C.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
C.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#
C.VERISEQ = (Select Max(to_Number(D.VERISEQ)) From BADAPR D Where D.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And D.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#)
Group By C.PAYYM)
Group By PAYYM ORDER BY PAYYM

SELECT A.CHKDATE, Decode(A.APLPAYMK,'3',A.APLPAYDATE) AS APLPAYDATE, A.RECAMT, A.SUPAMT FROM BADAPR A
1 = 0
A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.SEQNO = '0000' AND A.ISSUYM = ( SELECT MAX(B.ISSUYM) FROM BADAPR B WHERE B.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND B.SEQNO = '0000' AND B.MTESTMK = 'F' AND B.APLPAYMK = '3' AND Trim(B.APLPAYDATE) Is Not Null)
AND A.MTESTMK = 'F' And A.APLPAYMK = '3' AnD Trim(A.APLPAYDATE) Is Not Null AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT PAYYM, DECODE(SUBSTR(SEQNO,3,1),0,BEFISSUEAMT,ISSUEAMT) AS ISSUEAMT, ADJUSTAMT, OTHERAMT, PAYRATE, APLPAYAMT, BADDEBTAMT, UNITPAYAMT, RETURNAMT, REMAINAMT, LOANAMT, COMPENAMT, LECOMAMT, RECOMAMT, (NVL(EVTOTHERAAMT,0) + NVL(EVTOTHERBAMT,0)) AS EVTOTHERAMT, EVTOFFSETAMT, BADDEBTAMT, PAYBANANCE, RECAMT, NVL(INHERITORAMT,0) AS INHERITORAMT FROM BADAPR
1 = 0
APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#
ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#
VERISEQ = ( SELECT MAX(to_Number(VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# )
ORDER BY PAYYM

SELECT A.PAYYM, A.OLDAAMT, A.QUALCOUNT, A.OLDRATE, A.OLDBAMT, A.ISSUEAMT, A.OLDAB, A.COMPENAMT FROM BADAPR A WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.SEQNO = '0000' AND A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND A.VERISEQ = ( SELECT MAX(to_Number(VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# ) ORDER BY A.PAYYM

Select A.LOANAMT, A.RECAPAMT, A.LOANITRT, A.DLINEDATE, A.BADDEBTAMT, A.OFFSETEXP, sum(A.OFFSETAMT) as OFFSETAMT From BADAPR A
1 = 0
A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#
A.VERISEQ = ( SELECT MAX(to_Number(VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000')
AND A.SEQNO = '0000' AND A.LOANAMT > 0 Group By A.LOANAMT, A.RECAPAMT, A.LOANITRT, A.DLINEDATE, A.BADDEBTAMT, A.OFFSETEXP

select A.BEFISSUEAMT FROM BADAPR A Where A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And A.SEQNO = '0000' And A.MTESTMK = 'F' And A.ISSUYM = (SELECT MAX(A1.ISSUYM) FROM BADAPR A1 WHERE A1.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And A1.SEQNO = '0000' And A1.MTESTMK = 'F' And A1.Aplpaymk='3' And A1.Aplpaydate is not null ) And A.PAYYM = (SELECT MAX(A2.PAYYM) FROM BADAPR A2 WHERE A2.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And A2.SEQNO = '0000' And A2.ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM And A2.MTESTMK = 'F' And A2.Aplpaymk='3' And A2.Aplpaydate is not null ) And A.Aplpaymk='3' And A.Aplpaydate is not null

select A.LECOMAMT FROM BADAPR A Where A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And A.SEQNO = '0000' And A.MTESTMK = 'F' And A.ISSUYM = (SELECT MAX(A1.ISSUYM) FROM BADAPR A1 WHERE A1.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And A1.SEQNO = '0000' And A1.MTESTMK = 'F' And A1.Aplpaymk='3' And A1.Aplpaydate is not null ) And A.PAYYM = (SELECT MAX(A2.PAYYM) FROM BADAPR A2 WHERE A2.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And A2.SEQNO = '0000' And A2.ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM And A2.MTESTMK = 'F' And A2.Aplpaymk='3' And A2.Aplpaydate is not null ) And A.Aplpaymk='3' And A.Aplpaydate is not null And A.PAYKIND NOT IN ('34','44','54')

select A.RECOMAMT FROM BADAPR A Where A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And A.SEQNO = '0000' And A.MTESTMK = 'F' And A.ISSUYM = (SELECT MAX(A1.ISSUYM) FROM BADAPR A1 WHERE A1.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And A1.SEQNO = '0000' And A1.MTESTMK = 'F' And A1.Aplpaymk='3' And A1.Aplpaydate is not null ) And A.PAYYM = (SELECT MAX(A2.PAYYM) FROM BADAPR A2 WHERE A2.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And A2.SEQNO = '0000' And A2.ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM And A2.MTESTMK = 'F' And A2.Aplpaymk='3' And A2.Aplpaydate is not null ) And A.Aplpaymk='3' And A.Aplpaydate is not null And A.PAYKIND NOT IN ('34','44','54')

SELECT A.INSAVGAMT, A.BEFISSUEAMT, A.OLDBAMT, (A.OLDBAMT - A.OCACCADDAMT) AS APLPAYAMT, A.OCACCADDAMT FROM BADAPR A WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.SEQNO = '0000' AND A.PAYKIND = '37' AND A.ISSUYM = (SELECT MAX(B.ISSUYM) FROM BADAPR B WHERE B.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND B.SEQNO = '0000' AND B.PAYKIND = '37') AND A.PAYYM = (SELECT MAX(C.PAYYM) FROM BADAPR C WHERE C.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND C.SEQNO = '0000' AND C.PAYKIND = '37' AND C.ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM ) AND A.VERISEQ = (SELECT MAX(to_Number(D.VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR D WHERE D.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND D.SEQNO = '0000' AND D.PAYKIND = '37' AND D.ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM)
SELECT DISTINCT PAYYM, LPAD(SUBSTR(PAYYM,0,4)-1911, 3, '0')||SUBSTR(PAYYM,5,6) AS PAYYMSTR FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# ORDER BY PAYYM
SELECT COUNT(*) AS DATACOUNT FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO <> '0000'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS DATACOUNT FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO <> '0000' AND MTESTMK = 'F'

select sum(A.LECOMAMT) AS LECOMAMT FROM BADAPR A Where A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And A.SEQNO = '0000' And A.MTESTMK = 'F' And A.ISSUYM = (SELECT MAX(A1.ISSUYM) FROM BADAPR A1 WHERE A1.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And A1.SEQNO = '0000' And A1.MTESTMK = 'F' And A1.Aplpaymk='3' And A1.Aplpaydate is not null ) And A.PAYYM = (SELECT MAX(A2.PAYYM) FROM BADAPR A2 WHERE A2.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And A2.SEQNO = '0000' And A2.ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM And A2.MTESTMK = 'F' And A2.Aplpaymk='3' And A2.Aplpaydate is not null ) And A.Aplpaymk='3' And A.Aplpaydate is not null
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BADAPR SET MANCHKMK = #manchkMk:VARCHAR# WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND MTESTMK = 'D'
UPDATE BADAPR SET MANCHKMK = #manchkMk:VARCHAR# WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR# AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND PAYYM = #payYm:VARCHAR# AND MTESTMK = 'D'
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS DATACOUNT FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND MTESTMK = 'F' AND (NVL(APLPAYMK,' ')<>' ' AND APLPAYMK IS NOT NULL)

SELECT T2.LOANAMT, T2.RECAPAMT, T2.LOANITRT, T2.DLINEDATE, T2.BADDEBTAMT, T2.OFFSETEXP, T2.OFFSETAMT FROM (SELECT APNO, SEQNO, ISSUYM, EVTIDNNO FROM BAAPPBASE WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000'
PAYKIND in ('35','36','38')
) T1, (SELECT APNO, VERISEQ, ISSUYM, LOANAMT, RECAPAMT, LOANITRT, DLINEDATE, BADDEBTAMT, OFFSETEXP, SUM(OFFSETAMT) OFFSETAMT FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000'
PAYKIND in ('35','36','38')
GROUP BY APNO, ISSUYM, VERISEQ, LOANAMT, RECAPAMT, LOANITRT, DLINEDATE, BADDEBTAMT, OFFSETEXP ) T2, (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(VERISEQ)) AS VERISEQ, ISSUYM FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000'
PAYKIND in ('35','36','38')
GROUP BY ISSUYM ) T3 WHERE T1.APNO = T2.APNO AND T1.ISSUYM = T2.ISSUYM AND T1.ISSUYM = T3.ISSUYM AND T2.VERISEQ = T3.VERISEQ AND T2.ISSUYM = T3.ISSUYM

SELECT T2.LOANAMT, T4.NRMONEY RECAPAMT, T4.OWINT LOANITRT, T4.PAYDATE DLINEDATE, T2.BADDEBTAMT, T4.OFFSETEXP, T2.OFFSETAMT FROM (SELECT APNO, SEQNO, ISSUYM, EVTIDNNO FROM BAAPPBASE WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000'
PAYKIND in ('35','36','38')
) T1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT APNO, ISSUYM, SUM(NRMONEY) NRMONEY, SUM(OWINT) OWINT, PAYDATE, SUM(OFFSETEXP) OFFSETEXP FROM BALASTREPLY WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000'
AND (ERRMK <> '*' Or Trim(ERRMK) Is Null)
GROUP BY APNO, ISSUYM, PAYDATE) T4 ON T1.APNO = T4.APNO AND T1.ISSUYM = T4.ISSUYM, (SELECT APNO, VERISEQ, ISSUYM, LOANAMT, RECAPAMT, LOANITRT, DLINEDATE, BADDEBTAMT, OFFSETEXP, SUM(OFFSETAMT) OFFSETAMT FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000'
PAYKIND in ('35','36','38')
GROUP BY APNO, ISSUYM, VERISEQ, LOANAMT, RECAPAMT, LOANITRT, DLINEDATE, BADDEBTAMT, OFFSETEXP ) T2, (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(VERISEQ)) AS VERISEQ, ISSUYM FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000'
PAYKIND in ('35','36','38')
GROUP BY ISSUYM ) T3 WHERE T1.APNO = T2.APNO AND T1.ISSUYM = T2.ISSUYM AND T1.ISSUYM = T3.ISSUYM AND T2.VERISEQ = T3.VERISEQ AND T2.ISSUYM = T3.ISSUYM

SELECT ISSUYM AS ISSUPAYYM,
PAYYM AS ISSUPAYYM,
DLINEDATE, NVL(LOANAMT,0) AS LOANAMT, NVL(RECAPAMT,0) AS RECAPAMT, NVL(LOANITRT,0) AS LOANITRT, BADDEBTAMT, NVL(OFFSETEXP,0) AS OFFSETEXP, NVL(SUM(OFFSETAMT),0) AS OFFSETAMT FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000'
PAYKIND in ('35','36','38')
AND MTESTMK = 'F' AND TRIM(DLINEDATE) IS NOT NULL
ISSUYM >= #startYm:VARCHAR# AND ISSUYM <= #endYm:VARCHAR#
PAYYM >= #startYm:VARCHAR# AND PAYYM <= #endYm:VARCHAR#
GROUP BY ISSUYM ,DLINEDATE ,NVL(LOANAMT,0) ,NVL(RECAPAMT,0) ,NVL(LOANITRT,0) ,BADDEBTAMT ,NVL(OFFSETEXP,0) ORDER BY ISSUYM DESC
GROUP BY PAYYM ,DLINEDATE ,NVL(LOANAMT,0) ,NVL(RECAPAMT,0) ,NVL(LOANITRT,0) ,BADDEBTAMT ,NVL(OFFSETEXP,0) ORDER BY PAYYM DESC

SELECT DISTINCT T2.NITRMY, T2.NITRMM, T2.ITRMY, T2.ITRMD, T2.APLPAYSENIY, T2.APLPAYSENIM, T2.NOLDTY, T2.NOLDTM, T2.VALSENIY, T2.VALSENIM, T2.INSAVGAMT, T1.EVTIDNNO FROM (SELECT APNO, SEQNO, ISSUYM, EVTIDNNO FROM BAAPPBASE WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' ) T1, (SELECT DISTINCT APNO, VERISEQ, ISSUYM, NITRMY, NITRMM, ITRMY, ITRMD, APLPAYSENIY, APLPAYSENIM, NOLDTY, NOLDTM, VALSENIY, VALSENIM, INSAVGAMT FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' ) T2, (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(VERISEQ)) AS VERISEQ, ISSUYM FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' GROUP BY ISSUYM ) T3 WHERE T1.APNO = T2.APNO AND T1.ISSUYM = T2.ISSUYM AND T1.ISSUYM = T3.ISSUYM AND T2.VERISEQ = T3.VERISEQ AND T2.ISSUYM = T3.ISSUYM

SELECT SUM(BEFISSUEAMT) FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND MTESTMK = 'F' AND APLPAYMK = '3' AND PAYYM = (SELECT MAX(PAYYM) FROM BADAPR T WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND MTESTMK = 'F' AND APLPAYMK = '3' ) and SUPRECMK is null
and BEFISSUEAMT > 0

SELECT T1.PAYYM, T1.BEFISSUEAMT, NVL(T1.ISSUCALCAMT,0) AS ISSUCALCAMT, NVL(T1.CPIRATE,0) AS CPIRATE FROM BADAPR T1 WHERE T1.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND T1.SEQNO = '0000' AND T1.PAYYM = (SELECT MIN(A1.PAYYM) FROM BADAPR A1 WHERE A1.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A1.CPIRATE = T1.CPIRATE AND A1.MTESTMK = 'F' AND A1.APLPAYMK = '3' AND A1.APLPAYDATE IS NOT NULL) AND T1.ISSUYM = (SELECT MAX(C1.ISSUYM) FROM BADAPR C1 WHERE C1.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND C1.PAYYM = T1.PAYYM AND C1.MTESTMK = 'F' AND C1.APLPAYMK = '3' AND C1.APLPAYDATE IS NOT NULL) AND T1.MTESTMK = 'F' AND T1.APLPAYMK = '3' AND T1.APLPAYDATE IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT T2.PAYYM, T2.BEFISSUEAMT, NVL(T2.ISSUCALCAMT,0) AS ISSUCALCAMT, NVL(T2.CPIRATE,0) AS CPIRATE FROM BADAPR T2 WHERE T2.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND T2.SEQNO = '0000' AND T2.PAYYM = (SELECT MIN(B1.PAYYM) FROM BADAPR B1 WHERE B1.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND B1.MTESTMK = 'F' AND B1.APLPAYMK = '3' AND B1.APLPAYDATE IS NOT NULL) AND T2.ISSUYM = (SELECT MAX(D1.ISSUYM) FROM BADAPR D1 WHERE D1.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND D1.PAYYM = T2.PAYYM AND D1.MTESTMK = 'F' AND D1.APLPAYMK = '3' AND D1.APLPAYDATE IS NOT NULL) AND T2.MTESTMK = 'F' AND T2.APLPAYMK = '3' AND T2.APLPAYDATE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY PAYYM

SELECT A.ISSUYM, A.NOWPAYYM, B.NOWISSUEAMT, C.LASTISSUEAMT, A.CPIRATE FROM (SELECT A.ISSUYM, A.PAYYM AS "NOWPAYYM", NVL(A.CPIRATE, 0) AS CPIRATE FROM badapr A WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.SEQNO = '0000' AND A.MTESTMK = 'F' AND A.APLPAYMK = '3' AND A.APLPAYDATE Is Not Null AND A.PAYKIND IN ('34', '44', '54')) A, (select ISSUYM, PAYYM, SUM(NVL(BEFISSUEAMT, 0)) AS "NOWISSUEAMT" from badapr where apno = #apNo:VARCHAR# and seqno = '0000' AND MTESTMK = 'F' AND APLPAYMK = '3' AND APLPAYDATE Is Not Null AND (ISSUYM, PAYYM) IN (SELECT ISSUYM, PAYYM FROM BADAPR A WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.SEQNO = '0000' AND A.MTESTMK = 'F' AND A.APLPAYMK = '3' AND A.APLPAYDATE Is Not Null AND A.PAYKIND IN ('34', '44', '54')) GROUP BY ISSUYM, PAYYM) B, (select ISSUYM, PAYYM, SUM(NVL(BEFISSUEAMT, 0)) AS "LASTISSUEAMT" from badapr where apno = #apNo:VARCHAR# and seqno = '0000' AND MTESTMK = 'F' AND APLPAYMK = '3' AND APLPAYDATE Is Not Null AND PAYKIND NOT IN ('34', '44', '54') AND (ISSUYM, PAYYM) IN (SELECT ISSUYM, PAYYM FROM BADAPR A WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.SEQNO = '0000' AND A.MTESTMK = 'F' AND A.APLPAYMK = '3' AND A.APLPAYDATE Is Not Null AND A.PAYKIND IN ('34', '44', '54')) GROUP BY ISSUYM, PAYYM) C WHERE A.ISSUYM = B.ISSUYM AND A.NOWPAYYM = B.PAYYM AND A.ISSUYM = C.ISSUYM AND A.NOWPAYYM = C.PAYYM ORDER BY ISSUYM, NOWPAYYM
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BADAPR T SET T.ISSUEAMT= 0, T.APLPAYAMT = 0, T.REMITMK = '5', T.REMITDATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') WHERE T.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND T.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR# AND T.ISSUYM = #oriIssuYm:VARCHAR# AND T.PAYYM = #payYm:VARCHAR# AND T.REMITMK = '2' AND T.MTESTMK = 'F' AND T.PAYKIND = #issuKind:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.delete:
DELETE FROM BADAPR T WHERE T.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
AND T.SEQNO <> #seqNo:VARCHAR#
AND T.ISSUYM = #oriIssuYm:VARCHAR# AND T.PAYYM = #payYm:VARCHAR# AND T.REMITMK = '2' AND T.MTESTMK = 'F' AND T.PAYKIND = #issuKind:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BADAPR T SET T.ISSUEAMT = #remitAmt:NUMERIC#, T.APLPAYAMT = #remitAmt:NUMERIC#, T.REMITMK = '2', T.REMITDATE = #brChkDate:VARCHAR# WHERE T.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND T.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR# AND T.ISSUYM = #oriIssuYm:VARCHAR# AND T.PAYYM = #payYm:VARCHAR# AND T.MTESTMK = 'F' AND T.PAYKIND = #issuKind:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO BADAPR (BADAPRID, BAAPPBASEID, APNO, SEQNO, ISSUYM, PAYYM, MTESTMK, VERISEQ, PAYKIND, MCHKTYP, ACCEPTMK, MANCHKMK, CHKDATE, BENIDS, BENIDN, BENEVTREL, ISSUEAMT, APLPAYAMT, PAYTYP, BUREAUACC, BANKNAME, PAYBANKID, BRANCHID, PAYEEACC, ACCIDN, ACCNAME, PAYRATE, APLPAYMK, APLPAYDATE, REMITMK, REMITDATE, PROCTIME, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, NACHGMK) SELECT BADAPRID.NEXTVAL, T2.BAAPPBASEID, T2.APNO, T2.SEQNO, T1.ISSUYM, T1.PAYYM, T1.MTESTMK, T1.VERISEQ, T1.PAYKIND, T1.MCHKTYP, T1.ACCEPTMK, T1.MANCHKMK, T1.CHKDATE, T2.BENIDS, T2.BENIDNNO, T2.BENEVTREL, #avgNum:NUMERIC#, #avgNum:NUMERIC#, T2.PAYTYP, T1.BUREAUACC, T2.BANKNAME, T2.PAYBANKID, T2.BRANCHID, T2.PAYEEACC, T2.ACCIDN, T2.ACCNAME, T2.MITRATE, '3', T1.APLPAYDATE, '2', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), T1.NLWKMK, T1.ADWKMK, T1.NACHGMK FROM BADAPR T1, (SELECT A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.BAAPPBASEID, A.BENIDS, A.BENIDNNO, A.BENEVTREL, A.PAYTYP, A.BANKNAME, A.PAYBANKID, A.BRANCHID, A.PAYEEACC, A.ACCIDN, A.ACCNAME, A.MITRATE FROM BAAPPBASE A WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.SEQNO = #heirSeqNo:VARCHAR#
AND NVL(TRIM(A.CASEMK),' ') <> 'D'
) T2 WHERE T1.APNO = T2.APNO AND T1.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND T1.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR# AND T1.ISSUYM = #oriIssuYm:VARCHAR# AND T1.PAYYM = #payYm:VARCHAR# AND T1.APLPAYMK = '3'
AND NVL(TRIM(T1.APLPAYDATE),' ')<>' '
AND T1.APLPAYDATE IS NOT NULL AND T1.MTESTMK = 'F' AND T1.PAYKIND = #payKind:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select:
Select A.APNO, A.ISSUYM, A.BEFISSUEAMT, A.OLDAB From BADAPR A Where APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
And ISSUYM < #issuYm:VARCHAR#
And PAYYM = ( Select Max(PAYYM) From BADAPR Where APNO= #apNo:VARCHAR#
And ISSUYM < #issuYm:VARCHAR#
And MTESTMK = 'F' And APLPAYMK = '3' And APLPAYDATE Is Not Null ) And TRIM(SUPRECMK) IS NULL And ROWNUM = 1

Select APNO, MIN(PAYYM) as MINSUPPAYYM, MAX(PAYYM) as MANSUPPAYYM, NVL(SUM(A.SUPAMT), '0') as SUMSUPAMT From BADAPR A Where APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# And VERISEQ = (Select Max(TO_NUMBER(VERISEQ)) From BADAPR Where APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#) And A.SUPRECMK = 'C' Group By A.APNO

Select APNO, ISSUYM, SUM(DECODE(SUPRECMK,'C',NVL(SUPAMT, '0'),'D',NVL(RECAMT, '0'),NVL(BEFISSUEAMT, '0'))) AS "TOTALISSUEAMT" From BADAPR A Where APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# And A.MTESTMK = 'F' And A.APLPAYMK = '3' And A.APLPAYDATE Is Not Null Group By APNO, ISSUYM
Select Count(t.Apno) From BADAPR t Where t.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And t.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# And t.MTESTMK = 'F' And t.APLPAYMK Is Not Null And t.APLPAYDATE Is Not Null And ROWNUM = 1

SELECT T.BEFISSUEAMT, T.INSAVGAMT, T.ITRMY, T.ITRMD, T.NITRMY, T.NITRMM, T.NOLDTY, T.NOLDTM, T.APLPAYSENIY, T.APLPAYSENIM, T.OLDRATE, T.CPIRATE, T1.APITEM, T1.APPDATE, T1.EVTDIEDATE From BADAPR T ,BAAPPBASE T1 Where T.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And T.SEQNO = '0000' And (T.SUPRECMK = '' Or T.SUPRECMK Is Null) And (T.BEFISSUEAMT > 0 And T.BEFISSUEAMT Is Not Null) And T.PAYYM = (Select Max(T1.PAYYM) From BADAPR T1 Where T1.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And T1.SEQNO = '0000'
And T1.PAYYM <= #evtJobYm:VARCHAR#
And (T1.SUPRECMK = '' Or T1.SUPRECMK Is Null) And (T1.BEFISSUEAMT > 0 And T1.BEFISSUEAMT Is Not Null)) And T.ISSUYM = (Select Max(T2.ISSUYM) From BADAPR T2 Where T2.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And T2.SEQNO = '0000' And T2.PAYYM = T.PAYYM And (T2.SUPRECMK = '' Or T2.SUPRECMK Is Null) And (T2.BEFISSUEAMT > 0 And T2.BEFISSUEAMT Is Not Null)) And T.VERISEQ = (Select Max(TO_NUMBER(T3.VERISEQ)) From BADAPR T3 Where T3.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And T3.SEQNO = '0000' And T3.ISSUYM = T.ISSUYM And T3.PAYYM = T.PAYYM And (T3.SUPRECMK = '' Or T3.SUPRECMK Is Null) And (T3.BEFISSUEAMT > 0 And T3.BEFISSUEAMT Is Not Null)) And RowNum = 1 And T.APNO = T1.APNO

SELECT APNO, CASETYP, CHKMAN, rank() over(PARTITION BY CHKMAN ORDER BY APNO) SEQNO FROM (SELECT DISTINCT APNO, CASETYP, CHKMAN FROM (SELECT B.CASETYP, B.CHKMAN, A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.ISSUYM, A.PAYYM, A.MANCHKMK, A.MTESTMK, A.APLPAYMK, A.APLPAYDATE, C.CHKCODEPRE FROM BADAPR A, BAAPPBASE B, BACHKFILE C WHERE A.APNO = B.APNO AND A.SEQNO = B.SEQNO AND A.APNO = C.APNO AND A.SEQNO = C.SEQNO AND A.ISSUYM = C.ISSUYM AND A.PAYYM = C.PAYYM AND A.APNO LIKE 'S%' AND A.SEQNO = '0000' AND A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND (B.EXEDATE > #preIssuDate:VARCHAR# AND B.EXEDATE <= #issuDate:VARCHAR#) AND A.MANCHKMK = 'Y' AND A.MTESTMK = 'F' AND A.APLPAYMK = '3' AND A.APLPAYDATE IS NOT NULL AND C.CHKCODEPRE = 'O' UNION ALL SELECT B.CASETYP, B.CHKMAN, A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.ISSUYM, A.PAYYM, A.MANCHKMK, A.MTESTMK, A.APLPAYMK, A.APLPAYDATE, C.CHKCODEPRE FROM BADAPR A, BAAPPBASE B, BACHKFILE C WHERE A.APNO = B.APNO AND A.SEQNO = B.SEQNO AND A.APNO = C.APNO AND A.SEQNO = C.SEQNO AND A.ISSUYM = C.ISSUYM AND A.PAYYM = C.PAYYM AND A.APNO LIKE 'S%' AND A.SEQNO <> '0000' AND A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND (B.EXEDATE > #preIssuDate:VARCHAR# AND B.EXEDATE <= #issuDate:VARCHAR#) AND A.MANCHKMK = 'Y' AND A.MTESTMK = 'F' AND A.APLPAYMK = '3' AND A.APLPAYDATE IS NOT NULL AND A.ISSUEAMT > 0 AND C.CHKCODEPRE = 'O') ORDER BY CHKMAN, APNO) ORDER BY CHKMAN, SEQNO

SELECT NVL(SUM(APLPAYAMT),0) AS APLPAYAMT FROM BADAPR
WHERE MTESTMK = 'F' AND MANCHKMK = 'Y' AND STEXPNDMK = 'Y' AND NVL(TRIM(CHKDATE),' ') <> ' ' AND APLPAYDATE IS NOT NULL AND NVL(TRIM(APLPAYDATE),' ') <> ' ' AND (NVL(TRIM(REMITMK),' ') <> '1')
1 = 0
APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
SEQNO IN
#seqNoList[]#
ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#
PAYYM = #payYm:VARCHAR#
Order By PAYYM

SELECT APNO, ISSUYM, PAYYM, NVL(SUM(APLPAYAMT), '0') as APLPAYAMT From BADAPR A Where A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
And A.SEQNO <> '0000'
And A.ISSUYM= #issuYm:VARCHAR# And A.PAYYM = ( Select Max(B.PAYYM) From BADAPR B Where B.APNO= #apNo:VARCHAR# And B.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# And B.VERISEQ = ( Select Max(TO_NUMBER(C.VERISEQ)) From BADAPR C Where C.APNO= #apNo:VARCHAR# And C.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# ) ) And A.VERISEQ = ( Select Max(TO_NUMBER(D.VERISEQ)) From BADAPR D Where D.APNO= #apNo:VARCHAR# And D.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# ) And Trim(A.SUPRECMK) Is Null GROUP BY APNO, ISSUYM, PAYYM

SELECT SUPAMT From BADAPR A Where A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And A.SEQNO = '0000' And A.ISSUYM= #issuYm:VARCHAR# And A.PAYYM = ( Select Min(B.PAYYM) From BADAPR B Where B.APNO= #apNo:VARCHAR# And B.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# And B.VERISEQ = ( Select Max(TO_NUMBER(C.VERISEQ)) From BADAPR C Where C.APNO= #apNo:VARCHAR# And C.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# And Trim(C.SUPRECMK) = 'C' ) And Trim(B.SUPRECMK) = 'C' ) And A.VERISEQ = ( Select Max(TO_NUMBER(D.VERISEQ)) From BADAPR D Where D.APNO= #apNo:VARCHAR# And D.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# And Trim(D.SUPRECMK) = 'C' ) And Trim(A.SUPRECMK) = 'C' And RowNum = 1

SELECT (Select t1.QUALCOUNT from BADAPR t1 Where t1.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# and t1.SEQNO = '0000' and t1.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# and t1.PAYYM = #payYm:VARCHAR# and t1.VERISEQ = (Select max(to_number(t11.VERISEQ)) from BADAPR t11 Where t11.APNO = t1.APNO and t11.SEQNO = t1.SEQNO and t11.ISSUYM = t1.ISSUYM and t11.PAYYM = t1.PAYYM) and t1.PAYKIND NOT IN ('34', '44', '54')) + (Select Count(A.apno) From BAAPPBASE A Where A.apno = #apNo:VARCHAR#
and A.seqno <> '0000'
and A.issuym = #issuYm:VARCHAR# and A.payym = #payYm:VARCHAR# and A.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE is not null and A.seqno in (Select t1.SEQNO from BADAPR t1 Where t1.APNO = A.apno and t1.SEQNO = A.SEQNO and t1.ISSUYM = A.issuym and t1.PAYYM = A.payym and t1.ACCEPTMK = 'N' and t1.VERISEQ = (Select max(to_number(t11.VERISEQ)) from BADAPR t11 Where t11.APNO = t1.APNO and t11.SEQNO = t1.SEQNO and t11.ISSUYM = t1.ISSUYM and t11.PAYYM = t1.PAYYM))) - (Select Count(B.apno) From BAAPPBASE B Where B.apno = #apNo:VARCHAR#
and B.seqno <> '0000'
And B.BENDIEDATE is not null and B.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE is not null) AS QUALCOUNT FROM dual

SELECT MAX(A2.PAYYM) FROM BADAPR A2 WHERE A2.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And A2.SEQNO = '0000' And A2.ISSUYM = (SELECT MAX(A3.ISSUYM) FROM BADAPR A3 WHERE A3.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A3.SEQNO = '0000'
AND A3.ISSUYM < #issuYm:VARCHAR#
AND A3.MTESTMK = 'F' AND A3.APLPAYMK = '3' AND A3.APLPAYDATE IS NOT NULL
AND NVL(TRIM(A3.APLPAYDATE), ' ') <> ' ')
AND A2.ISSUEAMT > 0

SELECT NVL(MIN(t.PAYYM),'000000') As "MINPAYYM", NVL(MAX(t.PAYYM),'000000') As "MAXPAYYM" From BADAPR t Where t.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And t.SEQNO = '0000' And t.ISSUYM= #issuYm:VARCHAR# And t.VERISEQ = ( Select Max(TO_NUMBER(A.VERISEQ)) From BADAPR A Where A.APNO= #apNo:VARCHAR# And A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# ) And Trim(t.SUPRECMK) Is Null
AND t.ISSUEAMT > 0

select NVL(MIN(PAYYM), '000000') As "MINPAYYM", NVL(MAX(PAYYM), '000000') As "MAXPAYYM" from ( select seqno, payym from (SELECT seqno, payym From BADAPR t Where t.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And t.SEQNO <> '0000' And t.BENEVTREL not in ('A','C','E','F','N','Z','O') And t.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# And t.VERISEQ = (Select Max(TO_NUMBER(A.VERISEQ)) From BADAPR A Where A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#)
AND t.ISSUEAMT > 0 order by t.payym, t.seqno) where rownum <= 1 union select seqno, payym from (SELECT seqno, payym From BADAPR t Where t.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And t.SEQNO <> '0000' And t.BENEVTREL not in ('A','C','E','F','N','Z','O') And t.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# And t.VERISEQ = (Select Max(TO_NUMBER(A.VERISEQ)) From BADAPR A Where A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#) AND t.ISSUEAMT > 0 order by t.payym desc, t.seqno) where rownum <= 1)

SELECT A.CHKLIST FROM BADAPR A WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.SEQNO = '0000' AND A.PAYKIND = '45' AND A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# And A.PAYYM = ( Select MAX(B.PAYYM) From BADAPR B Where B.APNO= #apNo:VARCHAR# And B.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# And B.VERISEQ = ( Select MAX(TO_NUMBER(C.VERISEQ)) From BADAPR C Where C.APNO= #apNo:VARCHAR# And C.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# )) And A.VERISEQ = ( Select MAX(TO_NUMBER(D.VERISEQ)) From BADAPR D Where D.APNO= #apNo:VARCHAR# And D.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# )

SELECT A.CHKLIST FROM BADAPR A WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.SEQNO = '0000' AND A.PAYKIND = '45' AND A.ISSUYM = ( Select MAX(B.ISSUYM) From BADAPR B Where B.APNO= #apNo:VARCHAR#
And B.ISSUYM < #issuYm:VARCHAR# )
And A.PAYYM = ( Select MAX(B.PAYYM) From BADAPR B Where B.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And B.ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM And B.VERISEQ = ( Select MAX(TO_NUMBER(C.VERISEQ)) From BADAPR C Where C.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And C.ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM )) And A.VERISEQ = ( Select MAX(TO_NUMBER(D.VERISEQ)) From BADAPR D Where D.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And D.ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BADAPR T SET T.CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# ,T.APLPAYMK = '3' ,T.APLPAYDATE = #aplpayDate:VARCHAR# ,T.REMITMK = '1' ,T.REMITDATE = #remitDate:VARCHAR# ,T.MANPAYCHGMK = 'Y' ,T.MANPAYCHGMAN = #manPayChgMan:VARCHAR# ,T.MANPAYCHGDATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') ,T.PROCTIME = #procTime:VARCHAR# WHERE T.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND T.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND T.MTESTMK = 'F' AND (TRIM(T.APLPAYMK) IS NULL OR NVL(T.APLPAYMK,' ') = ' ') AND (TRIM(T.APLPAYDATE) IS NULL OR NVL(T.APLPAYDATE,' ') = ' ') AND (TRIM(T.REMITMK) IS NULL OR NVL(T.REMITMK,' ') = ' ') AND (TRIM(T.REMITDATE) IS NULL OR NVL(T.REMITDATE,' ') = ' ')

UPDATE BADAPR T SET T.CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# ,T.APLPAYMK = '3' ,T.APLPAYDATE = #aplpayDate:VARCHAR# ,T.REMITMK = '1' ,T.REMITDATE = #remitDate:VARCHAR# ,T.MANPAYCHGMK = 'Y' ,T.MANPAYCHGMAN = #manPayChgMan:VARCHAR# ,T.MANPAYCHGDATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') ,T.PROCTIME = #procTime:VARCHAR# WHERE T.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND T.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND T.MTESTMK = 'F' AND T.MANPAYCHGMK = 'Y'

#manPayChgMan:VARCHAR#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') FROM BADAPR T WHERE T.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND T.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND T.VERISEQ = (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(B.VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR B WHERE B.APNO = T.APNO AND B.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.select:
SELECT T1.APNO ,T2.SEQNO ,T2.MTESTMK ,T2.BAAPPBASEID FROM BAAPPBASE T1, BADAPR T2 WHERE T1.APNO = T2.APNO AND T1.SEQNO = T2.SEQNO AND T1.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND T2.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#
AND ((TRIM(T2.APLPAYMK) IS NOT NULL OR NVL(T2.APLPAYMK,' ') <> ' ') OR (TRIM(T2.APLPAYDATE) IS NOT NULL OR NVL(T2.APLPAYDATE,' ') <> ' ') OR (TRIM(T2.REMITMK) IS NOT NULL OR NVL(T2.REMITMK,' ') <> ' ') OR (TRIM(T2.REMITDATE) IS NOT NULL OR NVL(T2.REMITDATE,' ') <> ' ') OR (TRIM(T2.GENMEDDATE) IS NOT NULL OR NVL(T2.GENMEDDATE,' ') <> ' '))
AND T2.VERISEQ = (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(T3.VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR T3 WHERE T3.APNO = T1.APNO AND T3.ISSUYM = T2.ISSUYM)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BADAPR T SET T.CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# ,T.APLPAYMK = '3' ,T.APLPAYDATE = #aplpayDate:VARCHAR# ,T.REMITMK = DECODE(T.SEQNO,'0000',T.REMITMK,DECODE(T.MANCHKMK,'Y','1',T.REMITMK)) ,T.REMITDATE = DECODE(T.SEQNO,'0000',T.REMITDATE,DECODE(T.MANCHKMK,'Y',#remitDate:VARCHAR#,T.REMITDATE)) ,T.MANPAYCHGMK = 'Y' ,T.MANPAYCHGMAN = #manPayChgMan:VARCHAR# ,T.MANPAYCHGDATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') ,T.PROCTIME = #procTime:VARCHAR# WHERE T.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND T.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND T.MTESTMK = 'F' AND (TRIM(T.APLPAYMK) IS NULL OR NVL(T.APLPAYMK,' ') = ' ') AND (TRIM(T.APLPAYDATE) IS NULL OR NVL(T.APLPAYDATE,' ') = ' ')
